41a3(mdo sde): pas na/ /yang dag nyid du tshig kyang smra/ /sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa/ /de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te/ /sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas/ /sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs/ /sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ /chos rnams de ltar rab shes na/ /
41a4(mdo sde): mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing / /'byung ba med par rab tu shes/ /bstan pa 'di ni rab shes na/ /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na/ /de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug /bya ba dag la zhugs pa yi/ /'khor rnams shin tu mi
41a5(mdo sde): phyed 'gyur/ /de ltar chos rnams stong par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/ /des ni gang yang mi shes med/ /'di ni ci yang med pa'i mtha'/ /ci yang med pa'i mtha' la yang / /byis pa dag gis ci dag brtags/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag des/ /yang dang
41a6(mdo sde): yang du 'khor bar gyur/ /ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin/ /gal te de dag rtog rig na/ /de las sdug bsngal mi skye ste/ /ngan 'gro rnams su'ang de mi 'gro/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis/ /de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas/ /gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi/ /'di
41a7(mdo sde): 'dra'i chos rnams spong bar byed/ /chos kun rnyed pa med par ni/ /chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba/ /de lta bu yi 'du shes te/ /'du shes de ltar rig par gyis/ /rnam par shes dang 'du shes su/ /byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te/ /brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la/ /mkhas
41b1(mdo sde): pa 'dir ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /stong pa rnyog pa med pa'i chos/ /'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te/ /'di la byis pa'i spyod yul med/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo/ /zhi ba stong pa rab bstan pa/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas chos
41b2(mdo sde): kyi rgyan yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag /bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te/ /sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ /chos rnams thams cad gnas med de/ /de dag la ni gnas yod min/ /gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa/ /
41b3(mdo sde): de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod/ /bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas/ /bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na/ /byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya/ /de la lha klus rtag tu bkur sti byed/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po
41b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin pos mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas bye ba de yi snyan pa brjod/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por mi 'chad par/ /chos bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang / /de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes
41b5(mdo sde): pa/ /de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed/ /shin tu des pas 'khor la chos ston te/ /thos nas dga' zhing ri mor byed pa skyed/ /de dag gis ni ye shes yangs pa 'byung / /de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong / /'jig rten
41b6(mdo sde): mgon po de la chos rnams ston/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar/ /de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes/ /de ltar spyod pa ci la'ang chags mi 'gyur/ /ye shes chags pa med cing don byed cing / /'jig rten na yang byang
41b7(mdo sde): chub spyad mchog spyod/ /shes pas chos kun la yang rab brtags te/ /de dag zhing rnams gzhan du'ang sprul pa 'gyed/ /sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas don byas nas/ /ji ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur/ /byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams/ /bsam pa
42a1(mdo sde): ji bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa/ /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ /rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dang rab ldan zhing / /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung / /phan yon gzhan yang mang po
42a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ /ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu mi sgul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur/ /de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de/ /mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dpal
42a3(mdo sde): gyis mngon 'phags te/ /lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur/ /su dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa/ /de ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa/ /de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur/ /sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du
42a4(mdo sde): med/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te/ /'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam rig na/ /de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur/ /mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang / /sngon gyi mtha' ma phra zhib rab tu shes/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas/ /mkhas pa'i tshig ni
42a5(mdo sde): rtag tu thogs pa med/ /rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing / /sgra dang nges tshig rnam pa mang la mkhas/ /las dang 'bras bu rnam smin nges pa ste/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras/ /ma tshang med pa'i
42a6(mdo sde): stobs kyis shugs 'chang zhing / /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yid du mi 'ong sgra ni thos mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ong sgra yang thos/ /de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /
42a7(mdo sde): shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan/ /de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med dang bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad/ /yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas/ /tha dad pa yi
42b1(mdo sde): sgra mang du ma shes/ /don dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang / /lha min lto 'phye mi'am ci la yang / /rtag tu sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /'byung
42b2(mdo sde): po srin po'i tshogs rnams ni/ /sha la za ba shin tu mi bzad pa/ /de dag nam yang de la 'jigs mi byed/ /mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas/ /shin tu dga' zhing ba spu zing zhes byed/ /sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher skyed/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab
42b3(mdo sde): don chen 'thob/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i/ /bskal pa stong mang de yi bsod nams stobs/ /rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus te/ /dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis/ /'das pa'i rgyal ba
42b4(mdo sde): dpag med thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na/ /sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod/ /skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la/ /dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni/ /bskal pa
42b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas dpag med rim gro byas/ /skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis/ /don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gcig /phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni/ /de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi phod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab mchog ste/ /phyi ma mi bzad
42b6(mdo sde): dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thos nas/ /'dzin pa des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed/ /de dag grong gi zas mchog legs par zos/ /stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste/ de yis rgyal
42b7(mdo sde): ba mang po yun ring mchod/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri 'dir nga yang mthong / /de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan/ /mya ngan nga 'das nas ni byams pa yang / /de tshe de la lung yang ston par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang / /nga yi bde ba can du kun 'dod
43a1(mdo sde): zhes/ /phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad/ /mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong / /bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par yang / /logs par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yong mi 'byung / /byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu yid rab bde ba myong bar
43a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste/ /'di ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog /so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes slobs la/ /phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa'
43a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang med pas mi skur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de
43a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ /de dag
43a5(mdo sde): bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon nu de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin
43a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don gcig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
43a7(mdo sde): du rab tu shes pa de ni gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams gsum las 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/ rnam pa gzhan du mi
43b1(mdo sde): smra/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed/ khams gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang gzugs kyi sa dang gzugs med pa'i sa dang nyon mongs pa'i sa dang ming gi sa dang sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/
43b2(mdo sde): ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pa/ brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/ yi ge shes pa/ yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos
43b3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la dbab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye
43b4(mdo sde): d gu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil pa'i gzungs dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu
43b5(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad/ tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to/ /
43b6(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang / /bla na med pa'i byang chub rab tshol zhing / /chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin/ /yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi smra/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba/ /rgyal ba
43b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos ni de yin te/ /dpa' bo the tsom bral bas shin tu rig /chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te/ /mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas/ /de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med/ /don gcig la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang / /
44a1(mdo sde): dmigs pa med par blo gros ldan pas shes/ /zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang / /ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs/ /de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la/ /stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs su mi lta zhing / /de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas/ /mtshan
44a2(mdo sde): rnams su yang lta bar yong mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab/ /bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi/ /de lta bur ni rab shes nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong / /ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig /de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong / /chos kun de yi rang
44a3(mdo sde): bzhin te/ /rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /yid la nams kyang 'byung ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad shes pas na/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /de la smon lam 'debs pa med/ /yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing / /ma log tshig smra rnam pa
44a4(mdo sde): gzhan mi smra/ /de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang / /rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang / /gzugs dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'/ /chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing / /rab tu dga' bas 'gro la
44a5(mdo sde): phan par spyod/ /ming gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste/ /ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang / /de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin/ /'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med/ /lta ba log pa kun nas zad/ /blo yang shin tu gtan la phab/ /
44a6(mdo sde): brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod/ /gal te bdud bye khrag khrig rnams/ /de yi sems dkrugs phyir 'ongs kyang / /bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te/ /de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /bdud kyi rgya mo rnams spangs te/ /tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med/ /bsam gtan
44a7(mdo sde): dag gi bde la mos/ /'jig rten stong par rab tu shes/ /'jig rten phung por smras pa yang / /de dag stong par rab tu rig /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi/ /stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos
44b1(mdo sde): mi gtong / /de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro/ /sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong / /mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de/ /smon lam rnams ni yongs mi gtong / /chos nyid dag ni de spyod tshe/ /skad cig
44b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus nyams mi byed/ /phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ni shin tu bstod pa yin/ /de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las/ /chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas/ /shes kyi khe ni rnam spongs la/ /skye bo mang la chos rab ston/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa/ /
44b3(mdo sde): rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pas/ /dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na/ /stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin la rjes su slob pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ de
44b4(mdo sde): lta bas na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad
44b5(mdo sde): kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam pa med pa dang mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas slong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang kun nas rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa med pa/
44b6(mdo sde): yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yongs su chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang blo
44b7(mdo sde): gros dang rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang brtan pa dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa/ zhi ba'i sa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
45a1(mdo sde): yul/ /yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin/ sems 'khrul pa med pa yin/
45a2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa/ /shin tu mthong dka' phra zhing zhi/ /'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge
45a3(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med/ /gzung ba med cing bstan du med/ /sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te/ /chos kun la ni rlom sems med/ /rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin
45a4(mdo sde): ces bsgrags/ /chos ni rdul tsam yong med de/ /rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams dmigs su med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang / /de ni rnam par rtog ces bya/ /chos de rnam par ma brtags pa/ /de ltar ting 'dzin shes
45a5(mdo sde): par gyis/ /sgra yis don rnams rab bstan te/ /sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med/ /sgra ni brag ca lta bu ste/ /bar snang dag gi nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te/ /'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs/ /mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgrar/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do/ /
45a6(mdo sde): 'gro zhing 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi/ /de lta bu yi 'gro ba med/ /'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras/ /ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs/ /mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod/ /mnyam gzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ /rlom sems med par byang chub rim par spyod/ /
45a7(mdo sde): dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog /mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sa 'di bsten byas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin/ /don gyi rnam par rig pa 'jug pa la/ /yi ge dag gis 'jug
45b1(mdo sde): par mi nus te/ /sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di/ /ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na/ /gal te zhing 'di bskal pas tshig gyur kyang / /ri mchog dbus
45b2(mdo sde): su zhugs pas mes mi tshig / bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang / /nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin/ /chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas/ /de ni me yi nang du yong mi 'tshig /gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la/ /'bar
45b3(mdo sde): ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shig ces/ /ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na/ /sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /nam mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ /rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni/ /byang
45b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag myong / /skye zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang / /skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med/ /gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa/ /de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ /'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon
45b5(mdo sde): rig nas/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig /'jig rten gyis ni ma gos shing / /'jig rten chos la mi chags te/ /lus ni thogs pa med par ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong / /sangs
45b6(mdo sde): rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa/ /chos rnams de dag der yang nyan/ /de la mi shes yong med de/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad/ /chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig /de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul/ /bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang / /de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur/ /byang
45b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po/ /mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma stong dag la/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag /zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni/ /gzungs dang mdo sde bzang po
46a1(mdo sde): dang / /mdo sde gzhan yang bye ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston/ /sems can mang po bsam mi khyab/ /phyir mi ldog la 'god par byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston kyang / /spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /
46a2(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste/ /dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis/ /'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor/ /dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang / /'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor/ /de dag thams cad byang chub phyir/ /rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /yon tan dpag
46a3(mdo sde): med de dag ni/ /nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob/ /nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing / /dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba/ /mi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/ /rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi/ /nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral/ /
46a4(mdo sde): spros med rnam par ma spros pa/ /spros pa dag las shin tu 'das/ /yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de/ /dbyangs kyis rig par dga' bas na/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /zad mi shes shing nye bar zhi/ /lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa/ /rnyog
46a5(mdo sde): med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bslab pa ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /
46a6(mdo sde): tshu rol dang ni pha rol med/ /sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te/ /de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni/ /de dag de las pha rol phyin/ /ting nge
46a7(mdo sde): 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
46b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems
46b2(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so/ /bde bar
46b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdag spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad
46b4(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis bstod do/ /'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing / /sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni/ /skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed/ /dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de/ /sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom
46b5(mdo sde): rtag tu gnas/ /bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des/ /sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin/ /rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing / /khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyo med de/ /gser dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang / /chags med gyur nas
46b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong / /khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste/ /bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams/ /bde gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la
46b7(mdo sde): gnas/ /lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs med de/ /byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags/ /bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing / /chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun
47a1(mdo sde): rtogs/ /thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje/ /skye dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse ba/ /stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni/ /de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis/ /rnam grol
47a2(mdo sde): skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med/ /so sor brtags te bag med thams cad spangs/ /bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom/ /ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen/ /mchog tu rnam dag zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/ /zla ba skar mar bcas pa gnam lhung zhing / /ri dang grong
47a3(mdo sde): du bcas pa'i sa zhig la/ /nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang / /khyod ni mi bden pa yi tshig mi gsung / /skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang / /sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni/ /stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yin/ /dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par
47a4(mdo sde): mdzad/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /mi dmigs pa yi bslab pa la/ /dpa' bo chen pos bslabs pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa/ /de lta bu yi chos ston te/ /mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang / /byis pa dag gis sa 'di min/ /
47a5(mdo sde): bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa/ /mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur/ /chos rnams bdag med rig pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsung / /yang dag chos la rab tu gnas/ /mgon po yang dag bden gnas te/ /yang dag
47a6(mdo sde): tshig ni rab tu gsung / /khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi yang dag spyod pa byung / /yang dag de yi rgyu 'dra bas/ /yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung / /yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslabs/ /yang dag bsam pa yang dag
47a7(mdo sde): spyod/ /yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa med/ /ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa/ /ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing / /ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te/ /sems can kun gyi bshes
47b1(mdo sde): gnyen khyod/ /ri rab bzhin du mi sgul te/ /mi g.yo rab tu gnas pa po/ /ston pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya che yang / /tshogs mang dag kyang sdud par mdzad/ /shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs/ /'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
47b2(mdo sde): shing / /seng ge'i stabs su rnam par gshegs/ /khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba/ /seng ge yis ni wa rnams bzhin/ /dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa/ /ma dul ba dag khyod kyis btul/ /de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur te/ /dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas/ /
47b3(mdo sde): lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/ /sdug dang mi sdug med pa yi/ /bdag med chos ni khyod ston te/ /ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag /log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams/ /'dren pa gang nas gshegs pa yi/ /lam yang rab tu
47b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis bstan/ /bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas/ /gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi/ /bdag med de dag mi shes so/ /'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston te/ /khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon/ /khyod ni ma
47b5(mdo sde): log pa yi tshig gsung ste/ /sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas/ /thams cad 'dren la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /
47b6(mdo sde): tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad/ /mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor/ /gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan/ /phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa/ /sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / /lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog /
47b7(mdo sde): shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non/ /khu byug bya mang 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin dang / /kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag /bya tshogs mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi char
48a1(mdo sde): yang des mi phod/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang / /sil snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / /pi bang rdza rnga rnga chen dung gi sgra/ /de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang / /khrung khrung rma bya mi'am ci yi sgra/ /sgra
48a2(mdo sde): dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang / /shin tu mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig /dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog
48a3(mdo sde): dgar 'gyur yin/ /lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang / /srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa/ /'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni/ /bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gi zil gyis non/ /bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin/ /mtshan rnams kun
48a4(mdo sde): gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan/ /bsod nams brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang / /rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan/ /dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga sgra snyan dang / /rnga'i sgra de bzhin kim pa la yi sgra/ /rab tu 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgra de kun/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya
48a5(mdo sde): yi char mi phod/ /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra/ /sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lha yi 'dra/ /lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs dgar 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /khrung khrung rma bya ngur pa khu byug dang / /ngang pa ku nal rnam mang bya yi tshogs/ /
48a6(mdo sde): de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang / /lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i sgra/ /srid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /tshangs
48a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang / /nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od/ /kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag /'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag /ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum na gos pa med/ /mi dbang yon tan dbyig
48b1(mdo sde): tshogs yon tan rin chen mnga'/ /rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam/ /de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod nas ni/ /gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa/ /sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis/ /shAkya
48b2(mdo sde): thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig smra/ /bde bar gshegs pas de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas/ /mi dbang chags med ye shes mnga' ba 'dzum pa mdzad/ /stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de zhus te/ /'dren pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad/ /sa
48b3(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos/ /lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste/ /shin tu sems rangs mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis/ /bde gshegs zil gyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni/ /
48b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gi sa ma lags/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes ma lus gsungs/ /shAkya'i seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren pa/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /'dod
48b5(mdo sde): chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel/ /rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags/ /byang chub dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa khyod kyis bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed dang / /de las lhag par yang ni spyod pa rab tu spyad/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa
48b6(mdo sde): 'di mdzad bstan du gsol/ /ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir/ /ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad/ /sras dang btsun mo gnyen bshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang / /thub pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags/ /rta dang ba glang
48b7(mdo sde): dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang / /bran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang / /spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma btang ba/ /rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med/ /srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur/ /sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu
49a1(mdo sde): mkhyen/ /sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad/ /mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod/ /gang gi don ni rgya che yangs par 'gyur/ /spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin/ /thub pa
49a2(mdo sde): gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /pad ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan/ /gser gyi pad ma shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /mdzes shing yid du 'thad pa sa las byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po
49a3(mdo sde): de la mchis/ /chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te/ /'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu/ /rnga dang dung dang 'khar rnga sgra chen dang / /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi/ /de dag sgra ni nam mkha' 'di las gda'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab/ /khrung khrung
49a4(mdo sde): ngang pa ka la ping ka dang / /khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba yang / /de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams/ /sngon gyi bskal pa mang por bsnyen par bgyis/ /gang gis mi
49a5(mdo sde): yi gtso bo rab mchod na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes/ /gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon chad zhus/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /stobs bcu ldan pa
49a6(mdo sde): ji snyed 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon bde gshegs dang / /mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /de phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags/ /srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang / /mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra dang / /skye dgu'i sems kyi
49a7(mdo sde): rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /de phyir mi yi gtso la zhu ba lags/ /rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa/ /spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams/ /de phyir bdag ni rkang gnyis gtso la zhu/ /gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka'i
49b1(mdo sde): chos/ /stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams/ /de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o/ /srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir/ /gang gis byams pa snying rje rab bsgoms shing / /gang la sems can 'du shes
49b2(mdo sde): med pa dag / de phyir rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o/ /gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la ni gzung ba yong med de/ /sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin/ /de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o/ /tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol
49b3(mdo sde): phyin/ /dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug /khyod la 'khrul pa dag ni mi mnga' na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags maud gal bu/ /bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa/ /'di la de dag ye shes mi
49b4(mdo sde): 'jug ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/ /bslabs pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags/ /'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la/ /don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol/ /sngon gang
49b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / /skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam ste/ /de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris pa/ /'dren pas de yi 'bras bu deng gsung shig /gang zag chen pos lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul bum
49b6(mdo sde): gsang ba po/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing / /thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis/ /bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes/ /thams
49b7(mdo sde): cad thal mo sbyar cing gus pas 'khod/ /shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/ /mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis/ /shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/ /
50a1(mdo sde): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas/ /mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis/ /gang dag sngan chad bskal pa bye mang snyed/ /ye shes dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho kun gyi
50a2(mdo sde): bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa/ /'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis/ /
50a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig spyad bgyis kyang / /'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste/ /legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can/ /thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod/ /ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu/ /
50a4(mdo sde): snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis/ /'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa gsungs/ /rgyal ba rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par/ /gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa/ /rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs dbyung du gsol/ /
50a5(mdo sde): ngang pa khu byug rma bya sa ra sa/ /'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin/ /lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig /byams pa skyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid/ /ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste/ /don la
50a6(mdo sde): rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing / /bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyong ba/ /rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig /sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston/ /mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'joms/ /stong pa srog med sems can med pa
50a7(mdo sde): sgom/ /bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir spyad de/ /lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod/ /tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dad bgyid de/ /klu dang lto
50b1(mdo sde): 'phye 'dab grol bar bgyid/ /rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste/ /las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig /rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang / /gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'/ /'dren
50b2(mdo sde): pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags/ /'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor/ /lha yi spos ngad yid du 'ong ba ldang / /'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal/ /tshul
50b3(mdo sde): khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongs su dag / mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes/ /seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can/ /spobs dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs/ /thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig
50b4(mdo sde): rten med/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ /rma bya khu byug ka la ping ka'i sgra/ /shang shang te'u'i sgra yang yid 'ong ba/ /dga' 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gi char ni des mi phod/ /rnga dang rdza rnga 'khar rnga de bzhin
50b5(mdo sde): te/ /dung dang gling bu de bzhin pi bang dang / /sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus/ /de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phod/ /lha yi sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra/ /lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba skyed bgyid pa/ /de dag
50b6(mdo sde): bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phod/ /'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las/ /mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ /rgyal ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems/ /gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad bstan/ /lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad/ /mi 'am
50b7(mdo sde): ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa/ /de dag nam yang nyon mongs zhi mi bgyid/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel/ /dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags/ /byams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags/ /shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags/ /sangs
51a1(mdo sde): rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sel/ /'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung / /thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang gcod/ /mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa/ /thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston/ /ri dang nags bcas sa 'di gas
51a2(mdo sde): gyur cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin gas gyur la/ /zla ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang / /rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ /tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung / /seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde
51a3(mdo sde): gshegs thugs rje can/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang / /sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba ji snyed su
51a4(mdo sde): dag thugs rje can/ /dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni/ /rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa/ /gang gA'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang / /yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus
51a5(mdo sde): pa/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/ zla 'od
51a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pa/ /rtag tu khor mor shin tu bsngags par 'gyur/ /sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag
51a7(mdo sde): stong mthong / /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris/ /byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyad pa na/ /'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te/ /thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur/ /kun tu rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /de ni
51b1(mdo sde): phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la/ /'di la ma pham khyod nyid nga yi dpang / /rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu rgyas byed 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing / /lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub nges thob 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba
51b2(mdo sde): mang pos yongs bzung ste/ /'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur/ /nga ni ye shes la yang rab gnas te/ /zla 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing / /'di yi srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag /phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya/ /lag mthil skyu ru 'bru
51b3(mdo sde): lnga bkod pa bzhin/ /ma 'ongs pa na gang la mchod 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang / /de las lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed shes/ /lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang / /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dag /phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur/ /
51b4(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed/ /rkang gnyis gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te/ /ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas/ /phyi ma'i dus la de ni 'jig rten mgon/ /rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi/ /lung
51b5(mdo sde): bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te/ /ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas/ /mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod/ /e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa/ /rnal grol ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas/ /shin tu nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pas/ /
51b6(mdo sde): pha rol rgol ba dag gis zil mi non/ /chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg /dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi mdzad/ /khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'/ /srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug /spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi
51b7(mdo sde): gos shing / /lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs/ /lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas med pa/ /zil gyis ma non su dang mi 'phrod med/ /khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de/ /chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs/ /srid pa'i 'khri
52a1(mdo sde): shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad/ /srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing / /brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thugs su chud/ /mu stegs phyin ci log la gnas pa dag /mi mkhas de bzhin seng ges
52a2(mdo sde): wa bzhin bshig / bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter/ /gter mchog dam pa bdag gis deng thob ste/ /ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/ /'dren par mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom med/ /gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba/ /
52a3(mdo sde): phyag brkyang de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dpang bkod de/ /mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad/ /'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon
52a4(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rab tu
52a5(mdo sde): dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs
52a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan song thams cad las 'da'
52a7(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu
52b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de ting nge 'dzin 'di yang myur du 'thob bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag
52b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /sngon chad
52b3(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni/ /bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la/ /dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang / /de yi ming ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya/ /nga ni blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu/ /na bar gyur te mi bzad sdug bsngal tshor/ /de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos
52b4(mdo sde): smra ba/ /nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin/ /nga ni sman pa lnga brgya mi nyung ba/ /brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso bar byed/ /nga yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas/ /nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur/ /nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas/ /nad dri bar ni nga yi
52b5(mdo sde): drung du 'ongs/ /tshangs byin nga la brtse ba rab bskyed nas/ /ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur/ /nga ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas/ /'phags pa'i dga' ba zang zing med pa skyes/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas/ /nga yang de yi dus na nad las sos/ /mar
52b6(mdo sde): me mdzad ni spyad pa spyod pa na/ /dge slong chos smra mkhas par gyur pa yin/ /nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar/ /de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na/ /yongs su nyams pa 'di dag rjes dran zhing / /byis pas nyes par
52b7(mdo sde): brjod pa'i tshig bzod gyis/ /ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la legs par lhogs/ /phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag /brkam zhing gtum la ma bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar
53a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can/ /grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag /sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdob/ /rtse 'jo rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs/ /
53a2(mdo sde): gcig la gcig ni mgul 'khyud lag kyang sbrel/ /grong du spyod lam gzhan du sgyur bar byed/ /mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste/ /gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags/ /gzugs kyis rgyugs shing 'dun pa bor ba yin/ /grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu/ /
53a3(mdo sde): de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs/ /glu dang bro gar de bzhin rol mo dang / /nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson/ /btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor/ /mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed/ /tshul khrims de bzhin lam dag btang nas ni/ /khyim pa dag
53a4(mdo sde): dang bsten cing khrims dral nas/ /de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas/ /las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag smad pa/ /srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs/ /de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas/ /las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro /dung dang gser dang nor bu nor
53a5(mdo sde): mang dang / /khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/ /sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed/ /nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing / /bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags/ /gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa
53a6(mdo sde): rnams/ /de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs/ /ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na/ /bskal pa stong du shin tu dka' spyad de/ /nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na/ /de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs/ /de dag yun ring smra tshangs mi spyod/ /rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing
53a7(mdo sde): ngan song gzhol/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos min smra/ /de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste/ /rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa tshol/ /gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de/ /shi 'phos nas ni ngan song
53b1(mdo sde): sar yang 'gro/ /de dag brgya dang stong gi nang na yang / /de tshe bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkon/ /de phyir 'thab la brtson pa mang po 'byung / /bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' nged yin tshig tu smra/ /de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ /mi bden
53b2(mdo sde): sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te/ /tshul khrims nyams la byang chub ga la yod/ /gang la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing / /chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang / /chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa/ /ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong / /de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas
53b3(mdo sde): khyim spangs te/ /rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin/ /skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spang byas nas/ /bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlag par 'gyur/ /shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa/ /theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu brjod/ /gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa/ /
53b4(mdo sde): de nyid la yang nyes pa brgya dag brjod/ /'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod/ /byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas/ /stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur/ /phan tshun du yang rtsod pa byas nas ni/ /gnod sems khong khro
53b5(mdo sde): tha ba rab tu skyed/ /phan tshun du yang skur pa mngon 'debs shing / /sdig pa byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed/ /gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan/ /byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa/ /mnyen zhing des la shin tu bsdams pa rnams/ /de dag
53b6(mdo sde): de tshe yongs su brnyas par 'gyur/ /gang la shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang / /mi bzang ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa/ /chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'/ /de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur/ /bsgo bar bya zhing rab tu go bar bya/ /gzhon nu nga la dad
53b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'brang na/ /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di dran nas/ /de dag la ni nam yang yid mi rton/ /de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che/ /gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags/ /lus kyang ma dul ngag kyang ma dul zhing / /sems kyang ma dul ngan
54a1(mdo sde): song gzhol ba yin/ /nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na/ /dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de/ /tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur/ /nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //
54a2(mdo sde): de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ ri yi rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par bde gshegs bzhud/ /'jig
54a3(mdo sde): rten sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni/ /khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs
54a4(mdo sde): su bcad pas btang ba/ ri yi rgyal por rgyal ba mngon gnas par/ /ma pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song shig /der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang / /bla na med pa myur du grub par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
54a5(mdo sde): yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor de nas byung ste sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod
54a6(mdo sde): pa der song ste phyin nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya che ba/ sdong dum dang tsher ma dang rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med cing kho ra khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ sa
54a7(mdo sde): gzhi rin po che an da rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nye 'khor brgyan cing spud de/ bdug spos
54b1(mdo sde): kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'thul bar byas/ phreng ba dang lda ldis ni brgyan/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang / khyams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla re bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus
54b2(mdo sde): su ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting / ka tsa lin di ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs/ steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu
54b3(mdo sde): zheng dang 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi'i las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing
54b4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung / phyogs kun du ni nor bu rin po che chen pos snang bar gyur/ /rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bai dUr+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi
54b5(mdo sde): phung po kho ra khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to/ /zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan
54b6(mdo sde): 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug go/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba/ /rin chen rdo stengs bzang zhing dga' ba dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams/ /dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri yang btsugs/ /lha rdzas
54b7(mdo sde): gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing / /phyogs su nor bu rin chen 'od cher 'byung / /rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai dUr+ya/ /ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul/ /ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ /rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du/ /byams pa dpa'
55a1(mdo sde): bos de dag rab sprul nas/ /skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par btsud de gdan las
55a2(mdo sde): bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon pa dang byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon nas byams pas mngon par
55a3(mdo sde): sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma
55a4(mdo sde): yin pas ni phyag byas te 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhags par gyur pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig
55a5(mdo sde): mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thogs nas rol mo ni byed/ pheg ni rdob/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan ni sgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi
55a6(mdo sde): ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang na yod pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa
55a7(mdo sde): dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gus pa dang ldan ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
55b1(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la
55b2(mdo sde): skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phye'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
55b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig / de skad ces bka' stsal te/ go skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam
55b4(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam
55b5(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te/ de pha rol gyis gshes sam/ spyos pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing / nyes
55b6(mdo sde): par rjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu byang
55b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang tshul khrims mi gnas
56a1(mdo sde): pa dang tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob
56a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang sems dngangs pa dang sems skyo ba dang don du mi gnyer cing mngon par mi dga' ba dang ma chags ma zhen pa dang khams gsum la yid skyo bas khams gsum las gzhan du
56a3(mdo sde): sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang
56a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad cing chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi khe lhur byed pa ma yin/ phan pa'i
56a5(mdo sde): dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi ci nas sems can 'di rnams chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
56a6(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
56a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags
56b1(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstod pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo / /dris shing
56b2(mdo sde): bcangs so/ /bklags so/ /bton to/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so/ /gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe
56b3(mdo sde): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag yas na/ /rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste/ /bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra de yi/ /tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug cur gyur/ /
56b4(mdo sde): de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba/ /mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes dbang phyug gi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis so/ /ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis
56b5(mdo sde): gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gi/ /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag drug cu bdun/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/ /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /blo gros dbang phyug pha rol
56b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi/ /tshe yi tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /mi yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo mi yi dbang
56b7(mdo sde): phyug gi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gyur/ /mi yi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi/ /tshe yi tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /
57a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug
57a2(mdo sde): gi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshang / /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang / /dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /zla ba'i
57a3(mdo sde): zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyi ni/ /tshe yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur/ /zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag brgyad
57a4(mdo sde): do/ /nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis
57a5(mdo sde): gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag brgyad gyur/ /bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang / /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung / /zil gyis ma non de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyis mnyan par gyis/ /
57a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i dbyangs/ /rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sgra/ /sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang / /dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang / /ye shes stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro/ /zil gyis ma
57a7(mdo sde): non ye shes yang dag 'phags/ /ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags/ /ye shes rnam grags de bzhin ye shes dpa'/ /tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog /tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs
57b1(mdo sde): pa'i mi dbang spyan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin/ /gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog /gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags/ /gzi brjid khyab dang gzi brjid shin tu nges/ /gzi brjid sgra dbyangs shin tu rnam grags gzi/ /
57b2(mdo sde): 'jigs btsan stobs dang 'jigs btsan blo gros dang / /shin tu 'jigs btsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs btsan 'phags/ /'jigs btsan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung / /sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang / /
57b3(mdo sde): rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs/ /bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang / /spyan dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang / /rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mtha' yas spyan/ /kun nas spyan dang rnam par
57b4(mdo sde): grags pa'i spyan/ /spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan/ /dul mchog dul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems/ /dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi dpal rab tu zhi/ /zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'/ /bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems/ /
57b5(mdo sde): shin tu dul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba/ /zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'/ /tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / /tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang / /tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa'
57b6(mdo sde): bo dang / /gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog /chos kyi bla ma chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags/ /chos kyi stobs ldan chos bzang dpa' bo dang / /rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung / /rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges
57b7(mdo sde): par ni/ /mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad cu ste/ /bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung / /byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod de/ /rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing / /thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan
58a1(mdo sde): 'dzin na/ /de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ /bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher
58a2(mdo sde): rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na/ /bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe/ /lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung / /de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs zhes bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni/ /tshe tshad lo grangs
58a3(mdo sde): bdun khri drug stong ste/ /nyan thos dag ni bye ba brgya phrag gsum/ /de yi 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin/ /mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ /zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung / /
58a4(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung ste/ /blo gros zab cing grags pa shin tu che/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur/ /mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan/ /stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud/ /zhing ni
58a5(mdo sde): bye bar de las lhag par yang / /gang gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro /rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni/ /phyir yang rgyal ba de yi drung du 'ong / /mdo sde sgrub pa'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas/ /snang bar gyur pa sa yi steng na rgyu/ /sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de/ /
58a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni/ /'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de/ /de dag la ni lha yang smon pa skyed/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer/ /mnyam gzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can/ /rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med
58a7(mdo sde): pa/ /dri ma med par rtag tu tshangs par spyod/ /tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs par ldan/ /nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas/ /sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston/ /dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang yongs su bzung / /bskal pa mtha' yas par
58b1(mdo sde): ni spyod pas 'phags/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags/ /rnam par thar dang don tshig yang dag ston/ /tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med/ /chu yis pad ma bzhin du mi chags te/ /khams gsum las ni rnam grol bag yod pa/ /'jig rten chos
58b2(mdo sde): brgyad dag gis mi gos shing / /lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongs su dag /'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che/ /chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ /sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyen te/ /tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed/ /gang la gnas
58b3(mdo sde): pa de nyid gzhan la ston/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung / /rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa/ /khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid/ /rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad/ /'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas/ /
58b4(mdo sde): mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed/ /'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam spangs te/ /stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan/ /
58b5(mdo sde): gzhon nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/ /rgyun chad med par bsngags pa rab brjod kyang / /de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin/ /de tshe mi yi dbang po'i dbyangs de ni/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te/ /stong gsum
58b6(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang / /lha dang klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur/ /de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad tshe/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha dang mi rnams gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas/ /der yang mi dbang
58b7(mdo sde): rgyal po byung ba ni/ /dpal gyi stobs zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ /de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug /rgyal po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni/ /bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod/ /sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang / /
59a1(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba byung / /de yang ston zla tha nya ba la/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal
59a2(mdo sde): ba de yi spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug / rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas/ /rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kun spangs te/ /gnyen dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas/ /rgyal ba de
59a3(mdo sde): yi drung du rab tu byung / /bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang / /gnyen bshes rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang / /bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab byung nas/ /kha zas sgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas
59a4(mdo sde): ni/ /rgyun ma chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags/ /'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas/ /rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de/ /rtag par rab tu mnyam gzhag dus byas pas/ /de yang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te/ /mngal gyi dri mas ma gos brdzus te
59a5(mdo sde): byung / /de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs zhes bya/ /blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur te/ /gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig smra ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam ge/ /'jig rten mgon pos bdag gi sems mkhyen nas/ /de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad/ /
59a6(mdo sde): rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang / /srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang / /mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba dag /byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /lus kyang
59a7(mdo sde): gtsang zhing de bzhin ngag gtsang ba/ /sems gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang / /dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa/ /lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan sgom pa ste/ /de bzhin
59b1(mdo sde): gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno/ /bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa/ /phung po yongs shes khams rnams mnyam pa nyid/ /skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba ste/ /skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /so so yang dag
59b2(mdo sde): rig pa bzhi la 'jug / yi ge thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang / /dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /dbyangs rnams yongs su shes shing dga' ba thob/ /bde gshegs bsngags pa la yang dgar gyur cing / /'phags pa
59b3(mdo sde): dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /des pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing / /mnyen zhing 'jam pa bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste/ /sems can mthong nas sngon du smra ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /le lo med cing bla
59b4(mdo sde): ma'i ri mo byed/ /sri zhu che bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta/ /skye ba dag gis chog shes dkar ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgon gnas dang / /sbyangs pa dag la gnas shing dran mi nyams/ /phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa
59b5(mdo sde): yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /skye mched mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang / /nyon mongs bsal ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang / /gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chad pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba kun
59b6(mdo sde): las 'da' ba dang / /skye ba dran zhing chos la nem nur med/ /chos la sems shing thos pa tshol ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug /ltung ba dag la mkhas shing 'byung bar gnas/ /de la gnas pas bag la
59b7(mdo sde): nyal ba sel/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /gang las ye shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba/ /mi g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi sgul ba/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams
60a1(mdo sde): yongs tshol zhing / /sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam par spong / /rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong du chud/ /mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig /sems can
60a2(mdo sde): dag gi bsam pa shes pas skul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston/ /khyad par shes pa skye ba shes pa dang / /mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shes/ /'gro ba kun tu mtshams sbyor shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyim gyi gnas
60a3(mdo sde): spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sems/ /khams gsum la yang mi dga' mi 'dzin cing / /sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dga' byed pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston mdzad pa/ /skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing / /rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin/ /
60a4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes/ /de bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi/ /'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /bzod pa
60a5(mdo sde): yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas/ /chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas/ /tshig rnams rab tu 'byed la ye shes mthong / /thugs rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sngon gyi mtha' shes phyi ma'i mtha' shes te/ /bde gshegs bstan las dus gsum mnyam pa
60a6(mdo sde): nyid/ /'khor gsum dag ni yongs su chad par gsungs/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang / /lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa/ /spyod lam dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi/ /chos ni skyes bu khyu mchog
60a7(mdo sde): thub pa ston/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang / /'jig rten shes pa rigs pa'i tshig rnams gsung / /chos rnams 'byung ba srog chags rang bzhin dang / /byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ston/ /rjes su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod dang / /mi dge ba yi sems
60b1(mdo sde): la smod pa dang / /sbyangs pa rjes su mi gtong bsod snyoms sbyong / /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa rtag tu spyod/ /bla ma la yang gus smra ldang ba dang / /thog ma nyid nas nga rgyal tshar bcad par/ /chos rnams rgyal ba chos rje de ltar ston/ /
60b2(mdo sde): sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste/ /ye shes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed/ /mi shes phyogs rnams rtag tu rnam par spong / /byang chub mchog gi chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgra shes pa/ /nges pa'i tshig la 'jug cing don rtogs dang / /gnod
60b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad rtag tu rnam spang par/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de ltar ston/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bsten/ /skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par spang / /rgyal ba la yang rtag tu dad cing dga'/ /chos mchog rgyal ba de ltar ston pa mdzad/ /btags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad
60b4(mdo sde): dang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ni rtag par spang / /rnyed dang ma rnyed pa la zhum pa med/ /chos kyi dam pa rgyal bas de ltar bstan/ /bkur sti rnyed kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing / /bkur sti ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag /yang dag bsngags pas nam yang rlom sems
60b5(mdo sde): med/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /gshe zhing smod pa thams cad bzod par bya/ /khyim pa kun dang lhan cig mi bsten cing / /rab tu byung ba dang yang 'grogs mi bya/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /
60b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas/ /spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing dul ba'i sems/ /chos kyi tshul 'di bde bar gshegs pas bshad/ /byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spang / /rigs sun pa yang thams cad spang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rtag par
60b7(mdo sde): yongs su bsrung / /chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston/ /smra ba nyung zhing rab tu 'brel la snyan/ /gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dge bar smra/ /phas kyi rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab min/ /
61a1(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo kun la yid mi brtan/ /sdug bsngal reg kyang yi mug med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na brtse ba bskyed/ /phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams
61a2(mdo sde): par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /chos kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / /'jig rten zang zing rtag tu gtang bar bya/ /bsags par mi bya spung bar mi bya ste/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul khrims
61a3(mdo sde): 'chal pa smad/ /g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la sten/ /nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang / /ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya/ /chos smra ba yang mi 'chad bsten
