61a4(mdo sde): par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ri mor bcas shing rtag tu yid dgar bya/ /zhi ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya/ /sngon spyod rnams la rtag par shin tu nges/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro/ /'du
61a5(mdo sde): shes bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang / /mtshan ma spang ba la yang thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mdo sde sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / /bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon du byed/ /rgyal
61a6(mdo sde): ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mgo gcig tu ni tshig rnams brjod par bya/ /ji lta bzhin du mthong zhes rtogs par mkhas/ /rtag tu tshig la the tshom med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu bsten/ /'jigs pa med
61a7(mdo sde): cing tshul khrims stobs la gnas/ /ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /shes kyi khe 'dod phyir ni yong mi bstan/ /sems kyang gya gyu can du mi bya ste/ /blta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par spang / /rgyal ba'i
61b1(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /spobs pa mchog dang gzungs kyang dam pa ste/ /ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' ma med/ /gsang sngags byin brlabs rigs par spobs pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lam 'di sgom pa dag ni tshul gyi sgo/ /bstan pa 'di la spyad
61b2(mdo sde): nas nan tan dang / /tshul dang gdams pa rjes su bstan pa bzang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags/ /bzod la gnas pas nyes pa rnam par spang / /ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan
61b3(mdo sde): pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ye shes rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mi rigs brtson pa khor mor rnam par spang / /sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin gshegs
61b4(mdo sde): pas bshad/ /mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste/ /'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni de
61b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brang / /lha rnams kyis kyang mchod cing ri mor byas/ /tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam/ /nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/ /klu yang stong gis rtag tu phyag byas pa/ /byang chub dam pa
61b6(mdo sde): rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob ste/ /nor mchog dam pa yang ni legs par rnyed/ /zang zing med pa'i ye shes gso ba mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /ye shes mdzod
61b7(mdo sde): yin spobs pa mi zad pa/ /'di ni mdo sde bye bar 'jug pa ste/ /khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /gang la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /'di ni pha rol 'gro ba'i gzings su bstan/ /'di ni chu bo rgal ba'i
62a1(mdo sde): gru yin te/ /'di ni snyan grags bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed/ /gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod pa yin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mi zad yon tan tshul/ /gang
62a2(mdo sde): dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/ /'di ni zhe sdang zhi bar byams pa bstan/ /'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms sa/ /'di ni grags pa chen po'i dbugs 'byin pa/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyi nan tan te/ /'di las sangs rgyas ye shes mchog kyang 'byung / /chos rnams
62a3(mdo sde): kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren pa dag gis bshad/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba rgyal bas bshad pa 'di/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed/ /'di ni byang chub rab zhugs spyod pa ste/ /bdud kyi sde rnams shin tu skrag par byed/ /rgyal bas ting 'dzin
62a4(mdo sde): zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /skyob pa chos la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'di/ /dgra yi nang du srung ba dam pa ste/ /phas kyi rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten byas na/ /'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang rab tu bstan/ /stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po
62a5(mdo sde): dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams brgyad bye brag 'phags/ /stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su tshol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang snga ltas so/ /skyes mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse bas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin/ /sangs
62a6(mdo sde): rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di bzung ste/ /'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas/ /de la bde gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa tshol
62a7(mdo sde): ba 'di/ /rnam dag sems gtsang nyon mongs med pa yis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/ /rgyal ba bzhin du de yi lus dag ste/ /rnam par thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong / /'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi mongs/ /ting 'dzin bzang po 'di
62b1(mdo sde): la bsten par gyis/ /zhe sdang sa min gti mug bral ba ste/ /bde ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin/ /rig pa skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/ /rnam grol snying por byed pa ngoms par bshad/ /bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi
62b2(mdo sde): 'di bstan/ /sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi spyan yin te/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/ /'di ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shes/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la/ /gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par
62b3(mdo sde): dka' mi 'gyur/ /byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas/ /'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen par byed pa yi/ /ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par dag /gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos/ /mi rigs brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur/ /
62b4(mdo sde): yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste/ /dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'di shes te/ /chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di la sten par byed pa yi/ /zhi ba dag dang smad pa med pas rtogs/ /
62b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pas rab tu 'di bzung ste/ /bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni/ /sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi skye ba med pa bstan/ /de ltar sred pa'i 'gro ba thams
62b6(mdo sde): cad na/ /sangs rgyas grags chen dag gi ye shes mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /gzhon nu de yis tshigs bcad 'di thos nas/ /khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams/ /dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
62b7(mdo sde): las ni mi ldog gnas/ /brtan pa'i stobs kyis gzhon nu de la smras/ /da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so/ /khye'u khyod la ni don 'di dri bar bya/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos/ /gzhon nus smras pa rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /bdag gis
63a1(mdo sde): bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste ri mor bgyis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bdag gis dris/ /gzhan yang bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du/ /de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur/ /nam yang
63a2(mdo sde): mngal du skyes par ma gyur to/ /de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms te/ /rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos/ /thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de/ /nem nur med pas byang chub reg par bgyi/ /dge slong su dag bdag la kun 'dri zhing / /ting 'dzin 'di la
63a3(mdo sde): yongs su chud bgyid pa/ /de la bdag ni gus par ri mor bgyid/ /'jig rten don mdzad dag la bgyi ba bzhin/ /su las bdag gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang / /lung mnos rjes 'thun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /de dag la yang bdag ni ston pa snyam/ /sangs rgyas
63a4(mdo sde): bzhin du gus pas ri mo bgyid/ /ting 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di/ /su dag la la bdag la 'dri ba yang / /'jig rten 'dren pa rgyal bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rmi lam na yang bdag la the tshom med/ /dge slong rgan rabs bar ma gzhon nu la/ /bdag ni ri mo
63a5(mdo sde): gus dang ldan par bgyid/ /ri mor ldan pas bdag gi snyan pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan 'phel/ /'thab cing rtsod pa dag la brtson mi bgyid/ /de tshe bdag ni brtson pa chung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/ /dge ba bgyis
63a6(mdo sde): pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/ /mi rigs brtson par sbyor zhing ma bsdams pa/ /de dag gi ni mi snyan tshig thos nas/ /de tshe bdag gir bgyi ba las su 'dzin/ /las rnams bgyis pa rnam par chud mi za/ /de la khro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i
63a7(mdo sde): bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin te/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/ /bzod pa bsgoms na byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag rab tu 'god/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag
63b1(mdo sde): brjod de/ /de na bdag gi tshig kyang btsun par gyur/ /dgon pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtag tu brjod/ /tshul khrims la ni rtag par rab gnas te/ /rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsal/ /de dag byang chub la yang yang dag btsud/ /de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag
63b2(mdo sde): bstabs/ /chos dang don rnams la yang rab tu gnas/ /gang la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa/ /byang chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis/ /bdag dran bskal pa 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste/ /de yi spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas
63b3(mdo sde): pa/ /bdag ni rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi/ /yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang / /bdag la bdud kyis shin tu smad cing spyos/ /'on kyang bdag gi sems ni yong ma 'khrugs/ /der ni bdud kyis bgams shing sad
63b4(mdo sde): na yang / /bdag gi byams bzod brtan pa 'tshal nas ni/ /sems dang bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ /lnga brgya byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /bdag ni rtag tu ser sna med par gyur/ /gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor mor 'chad/ /phyug cing nor
63b5(mdo sde): ldan bdag nyid chen por gyur/ /mu ge'i tshe yang bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur/ /dge slong su dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing / /su dag klog cing su dag lung nod pa/ /de dag la ni bdag kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid/ /de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag ni
63b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i las de yis/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung ste/ /rtag tu chos smra ba ni mkhas par gyur/ /sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te/ /bas mtha' dgon pa la yang khor mor gnas/ /kha zas phyir ni
63b7(mdo sde): tshul 'chos mi bgyid de/ /ngan ngon tsam dag gis kyang chog shes gyur/ /bdag ni rtag tu phrag dog ma mchis te/ /bdag ni khyim la'ang chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skye/ /phrag dog ma mchis nags dgon dga' bar bgyid/ /bdag
64a1(mdo sde): ni rtag tu byams la gnas par gyur/ /gshe zhing sdigs kyang khro ba mi skyed de/ /byams pa la yang gnas pa des pa yi/ /snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mched/ /rtag tu chog shes 'dod pa nyung bar gyur/ /dgon par gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon
64a2(mdo sde): tan brtson/ /bsod snyoms len pa dag kyang mi gtong ste/ /sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur/ /rtag tu dang bar bcas shing dad par gyur/ /khor mor sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang / /dad pa mang ba'i phan yon 'di lags te/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing dbang po
64a3(mdo sde): ma nyams gyur/ /gang dag 'chad pa de la bdag gnas te/ /bdag ni rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid/ /nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang / /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ri mor bgyid/ /yon tan ji snyed brjod pa 'di dag dang / /gzhan yang rnam pa du ma mang po yod/ /
64a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/ /mkhas pa 'di dag rtag tu bslab par bgyi/ /'di bas ches mang dka' ba spyad pa ni/ /sngon gyi bskal pa du mar mang spyad dran/ /da ltar de dag brjod par mi nus kyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du da mchi'o/ /byang chub sems
64a5(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab rno mkhas des/ /de yi mod la mngon shes lnga thob nas/ /de yang srog chags bye ba brgyad cu dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal ba'i drung du song / /brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas/ /de tshe bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung
64a6(mdo sde): du nyer lhags te/ /zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis dbang pos ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/ /rgyal po des kyang ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /rgyal srid btang ste ma chags rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas ting
64a7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di la sgom/ /klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa drug cu 'das pa'i 'og tu de/ /pad ma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur/ /rgyal po lhan cig rgyal ba'i drung 'ongs pa/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/ /de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /de tshe
64b1(mdo sde): dga' zhing mgu bas rab tu byung / /de dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di/ /bzung zhing bklags te rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'das nas ni/ /bskal pa gcig la byang chub mchog reg ste/ /mtshan ni ye shes bla ma mtha' yas pa/ /lha mis mchod pa'i
64b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams su gyur/ /de la rkang gnyis gtso bo re res kyang / /sems can gang gA'i bye snyed grol bar byas/ /byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na/ /nga ni rgyal po dpal gyi stobs su gyur/ /nga yi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang / /rjes su chos rnams skyong ba 'di dag yin/ /
64b3(mdo sde): de tshe gang su nga yi mar gyur pa/ /de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid yin te/ /bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba yi/ /nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'das/ /stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung ba/ /rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog /de tshe rgyal po zas gtsang de yin te/ /de
64b4(mdo sde): dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni bskal pa bye stong du/ /le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis/ /byang chub mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na/ /ting 'dzin yongs su tshol ba rnam par dag /gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /ting 'dzin 'di
64b5(mdo sde): la sgom par 'dod pa dag / brtson 'grus brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar/ /gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
64b6(mdo sde): pa la bka' stsal pa/ /gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan gyi phan yon
64b7(mdo sde): bzhir rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams zil gyis mi non par 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ ye shes dpag tu med par 'gyur/ spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
65a1(mdo sde): chen po gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
65a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /rtag pa'i dus su bsod nams kyang / /shin tu zil gyis ma non 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa bye brag 'phags/ /mchog tu dag pa spyod pa na/ /dpa'
65a3(mdo sde): bo rtag pa'i dus su yang / /bsod nams dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur/ /de la phas kyi rgol ba dag /su yang 'tshe bar yong mi byed/ /rtag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag pa'i dus su ye shes kyang / /dpag tu med par 'gyur ba yin/ /
65a4(mdo sde): zhi ba'i rten 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil mi non/ /byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/ /phas kyi rgol ba med cing mi tshugs 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes yangs shing rno bar
65a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /de bzhin spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de/ /dran pa'i stobs dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang 'byung / /don gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na/ /mkhas pa dag gi shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni
65a6(mdo sde): rab bshad na/ /shes rab ldan pa skye bo mang pos rig /ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang / /mgron du gnyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba'ang rnyed/ /shin tu gzhon zhing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba
65a7(mdo sde): mchog 'di tshol ba na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong / /'dren pa dag la mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /de la bar chad dag kyang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /sems dga' tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis/ /'jig
65b1(mdo sde): rten mgon po'i spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te/ /de ni nyams par nam yang yong mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mdzes pa'i sku bzhugs te/ /de yi ye shes nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
65b2(mdo sde): zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su mi 'gyur te/ /rtag tu phyug cing dbul po ma yin 'gyur/ /sems kyang 'dzin cing chags par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /mi khom par yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/ /sa bdag
65b3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bde bar 'ong / /bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de/ /ye shes yangs pa de la the tshom med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni/ /brtan pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gnas/ /bskal pa bye ba mtha'
65b4(mdo sde): yas dpag med du/ /stobs bcus de yi phan yon brjod na yang / /cha tsam du ni yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa bzhin/ /de tshe gzhon nu de yang rab dga' bas/ /langs nas rab tu thal sbyar phyag 'tshal te/ /mgu rangs stobs bcu
65b5(mdo sde): yi ni mngon sum 'dug / tshig rab mchog gis ched du rjod pa brjod/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /mi gtsos 'di dag ji tsam du/ /phan yon legs par rab bshad pa/ /dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab/ /phyi ma'i dus na su dag ni/ /mdo sde 'di la
65b6(mdo sde): nyan par 'gyur/ /phan par dgongs shing thugs brtse ba/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsungs/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ston pas de la bshad mdzad de/ /bcom ldan chags med ye shes can/ /tshig kyang 'di skad rab tu gsung / /su dag chos kyi
65b7(mdo sde): rjes slob cing / /mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur ba/ /nan tan bla na med pa yang / /gzhon nu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab tshol bas/ /mi dbang dag la mchod byed cing / /byams pa'i sems la snyen byed pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/ /
66a1(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs/ /yon tan mchog la bsnyen byas shing / /nan tan la yang gnas nas su/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/ /gang gis tshul khrims bshig pa dang / /sdig pa byed pa'i
66a2(mdo sde): lag nas ni/ /mdo sde 'di yang thos mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo tshangs par spyod pa dang / /gang gi sems kyang mi brkam zhing / /sangs rgyas dag gis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag lag nas thos par 'gyur/ /gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag /'jig rten mgon po ri mor
66a3(mdo sde): byas/ /de dag la gnas mdo sde 'di/ /phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/ /gang dag tshe rabs snga ma la/ /mu stegs can du gyur pa ni/ /de dag mdo sde 'di thos na/ /yid ni dga' zhing bder mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas/ /
66a4(mdo sde): rnyed dang bkur stis zil gyis non/ /gcig la gcig kyang smod par byed/ /dge slong dbang po ma bsdams pa/ /gzhan gyi bud med rab snyegs shing / /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnyed pa 'dod/ /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /sangs rgyas brnyes pa'i bsod nams dang / /
66a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan thob par mi 'dod cing / /bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/ /'jig rten bsam gtan 'bras bur 'dzin/ /dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed/ /
66a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu yi ni gling 'di ni/ /mchod rten ci yod kun bshig pas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/ /sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/ /sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /
66a7(mdo sde): mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad par/ /khyed la su dag spro ba yod/ /de tshe gzhon nu langs nas ni/ /ngu zhing rgyal la 'di skad gsol/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras po yis/ /'di skad seng ge'i sgra yang
66b1(mdo sde): bsgrags/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/ /bdag gis mdo sde rgyas par bgyi/ /byis pa rnams kyi mi bden pa/ /brgyad cing spyos pa bzod par bgyi/ /gshe ba dang ni bsdigs pa yang / /'dren
66b2(mdo sde): pa dang du blang bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la/ /ngan sems dag ni bskyed pa 'am/ /gang sngon bdag gis sdig pa yi/ /las rnams bgyis pa byang bar bgyi/ /spyi bo la ni phyag bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de bzhin gshegs
66b3(mdo sde): pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /zla 'od la ni ston pa gsung / /gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la/ /khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa dang / /srog gi bar chad mi 'byung bar/ /khyod la byin gyis brlab par bya/ /chos smra ba ni gzhan dag kyang / /brgyad brgya po dag langs nas ni/ /phyi ma'i
66b4(mdo sde): dus la bdag cag kyang / /mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa lags/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang / /bye ba brgyad cu nyer lhags te/ /gzhan yang khrag khrig drug cu rnams/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad smra/ /dge slong dag ni 'di rnams las/ /de ring su dag langs pa rnams/ /phyi dus
66b5(mdo sde): de tshe bdag cag gis/ /'dren pa rab tu bsrung bar bgyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/ /ston pa yi ni byin rlabs kyis/ /gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /zhing rnams ji snyed rab g.yos pas/ /kun tu sangs rgyas sprul pa dag /
66b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon pos rab bkye ste/ /de dag gis kyang chos rab bstan/ /zhing de so so re rer yang / /sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe de 'dra'i chos thos nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes bkod/ /sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas/ /sems can bye ba dgu bcu
66b7(mdo sde): rnams/ /byang chub kyi ni sems bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas la yang me tog 'thor/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu na/ /bskal pa gcig la thams cad kyang / /rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes/ /de dag mi gtsos lung bstan to/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen
67a1(mdo sde): pha dang dge bsnyen ma/ /srog chags bye ba bdun cu drug /gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /de dag mi gtsos lung bstan te/ /byang chub spyod pa rab spyod cing / /gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab
67a2(mdo sde): tshol bas/ /thams cad la yang mchod pa byed/ /mdo sde bla na med pa 'di/ /de dang der yang thos par 'gyur/ /byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la/ /bla na med pa'i mchod byas te/ /dam pa'i chos mchog bzung nas ni/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang na sangs rgyas
67a3(mdo sde): rdul bral ba/ /tshe dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /de la byang chub mchog gi phyir/ /mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di thos na/ /ma 'ongs pa yi bskal par ni/ /grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du/ /ngan 'gro rnams su yang mi 'gro/ /phyi ma'i
67a4(mdo sde): dus la su dag ni/ /mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing / 'chang ngam klog par byed pa yang / /de dag kun gyis nga la mchod/ /ji snyed mdun na 'dug pa rnams/ /thams cad la yang bsgo bya ste/ /ngas ni dka' bas thos pa yi/ /byang chub 'di yang yongs su gtad/ /ting nge
67a5(mdo sde): 'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
67a6(mdo sde): 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa thos nas mi skrag par 'dod pa dang mi dngang bar 'dod pa dang dngang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos
67a7(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi skrag /mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka'
67b1(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ji lta bur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la
67b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
67b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
67b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'don pa dang nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang / mang du byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs
67b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting
67b6(mdo sde): n ge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pa na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa
67b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa yang mngon par shes
68a1(mdo sde): pa chen po thob par gyur to/ /sems can dpag tu med pa yang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul
68a2(mdo sde): rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub
68a3(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho zhing / snang ba dpag tu med pa yang 'jig rten du byung / lha'i spos kyi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo/ /
68a4(mdo sde): lha dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te lhags pa de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi
68a5(mdo sde): rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas a la la zhes ga zha sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do/ /lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so/ /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rab tu rdung ngo / brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig
68a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /a la la bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyang cig char 'thun par byang chub sems
68a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
68b1(mdo sde): thob par bgyi'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i nang na chos ston pa la dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can zhes bya ba rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de
68b2(mdo sde): nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /glu dbyangs dag ji ltar len pa de bzhin du deng lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
68b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs rab tu sbyar ro/ /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sil snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang sgra gcig tu sbyar te/ pi bang gi khog pa bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
68b4(mdo sde): blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa 'thob pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid
68b5(mdo sde): rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang / dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can la yang rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ngas bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
68b6(mdo sde): par 'du mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan lnga brgya po shin tu legs par sbyar ba/ legs par blangs pa de dag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs su
68b7(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /skra gcig khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ci yod snyed/ /rgyal ba de dag zhing yang de snyed de/ /de dag mtshan nyid mi 'dra skal mi mnyam/ /skra yi khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror
69a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams zhugs/ /'dres pa med cing gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med/ /de yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /chu klung de bzhin mtshe'u dang lteng ka rnams/ /'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar rgyal
69a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /de yi gnas su ri bo du ma ste/ /khor yug dang ni lhun po rab lhun dang / /btang bzung dang ni btang bzung chen po dang / /'bigs byed bya rgod phung po gangs kyi ri/ /gnas der sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa/ /tsha dang rab tu tsha ba nyams mi dga'/ /
69a3(mdo sde): de na sems can dmyal skyes tshor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed/ /de yi gnas na lha yi gzhal med khang / /de dag dpag tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba/ /lha rnams stong phrag mang po de dag kyang / /lha yi dga' ba shin tu bde ba myong / /de yi gnas su
69a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams skye zhing / /'jig rten rig pa'i bstan pa 'bar ba snang / /gang gis rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa/ /ye shes bral ba dag gis de mi mthong / /de yi gnas nyid na yang chos nub cing / /'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la yis/ /
69a5(mdo sde): 'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston ces thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la dag /tshe tshad lo ni bsam yas bzhugs snyam 'dzin/ /de yi gnas na'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / /ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos/ /gnas der la la 'di snyam 'du shes te/ /yid kyi 'du shes dang ni
69a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yis/ /bde gshegs mthong mchod sangs rgyas mnyes byas snyam/ /skyes pa med cing mchod pa byas pa'ang med/ /mi dag bdag gi khyim na rmi lam bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas/ /phyir sad nas kyang de yis gdod ma mthong / /de ni rmi lam
69a7(mdo sde): yin par de yis shes/ /de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bye brag phyed/ /'di dag thams cad mi bden rmi lam bzhin/ /gang gis ting 'dzin 'di yang thob gyur pa/ /des ni chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes/ /su la'ang sdug dang mi sdug med pa ni/ /mi de 'jig rten na yang bde
69b1(mdo sde): skyid rtag / su dag nags khrod mngon par dga' ba yi/ /dge sbyong de ni shin tu bde ba myong / /su dag ci la'ang bdag gir bya ba med/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa kun tu spangs/ /bse ru bzhin du 'jig rten 'di na gnas/ /nam mkha' la ni rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin/ /lam
69b2(mdo sde): rnams bsgoms shing ye shes rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par/ /chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa/ /de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /su dag 'jig rten na ni yid chags med/ /de dag sems ni rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/ /sdug
69b3(mdo sde): dang mi sdug la yang chags pa med/ /'jig rten na ni mi de shin tu skyid/ /mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal te/ /sdug pa dang yang bral ba sdug bsngal yin/ /mthar byas 'di gnyis rab tu spangs nas ni/ /mi gang chos la dga' ba de dag skyid/ /gang zhig chos 'di
69b4(mdo sde): thos nas chags byed cing / /chos ma yin pa thos nas khong khro byed/ /nga rgyal rgyags pas bcom pa log pa de/ /nga rgyal dbang gis sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /su dag mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas te/ /rtag tu khengs pa med cing 'dud pa med/ /sdug dang mi sdug pa
69b5(mdo sde): las rab grol ba/ /de dag rtag tu grol yid legs par gnas/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag par rab gnas te/ /bsam gtan bsam mi khyab la rtag gnas shing / /su dag nags khrod zhi bar dga' ba ni/ /de dag nam yang yid gnyis yong mi 'gyur/ /mi bden
69b6(mdo sde): pa la su dag rab zhugs shing / /byis pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rtag tu dga'/ /bya rgod dag ni ro la mos pa bzhin/ /de dag rtag par bdud kyi dbang du 'gro/ /yang pi bang gi sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byung nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas
69b7(mdo sde): kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab mo nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa rjes su thob bo/ /dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can yang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi yi skye dgu sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
70a1(mdo sde): skyes so/ /sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi yang don byas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
70a2(mdo sde): gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslabs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs
70a3(mdo sde): thams cad gdon mi za zhing tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o/ /'du 'dzi med pa mang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos tshol ba la brtson pa dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang
70a4(mdo sde): chos la dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhon nu sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhan yang
70a5(mdo sde): gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsams shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste/ gang snying rje
70a6(mdo sde): chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya/ rim gror bya ste/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen
70a7(mdo sde): dag lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa
70b1(mdo sde): med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gang las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
70b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol ba dang sri zhu bya ba dang g.yog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bde bar snying rje
70b3(mdo sde): chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'thob bo/ /gzhon nu de lta bas na mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du byas te rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ rim gror bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
70b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar las na/ snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ci smos/ gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes
70b5(mdo sde): gnyen yongs su btsal ba dang sri zhu bya ba dang g.yog bya ba la yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od
70b6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba bstan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba mang po ste/ /dpag tu med cing gzhal med bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis
70b7(mdo sde): gtso bo byung bar gyur/ /des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad de/ /de la mi dang srog dang gang zag med/ /sgyu ma chu bur smig rgyu glog 'dra zhing / /chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /shi nas 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba yi/ /sems can shed las skyes pa mi
71a1(mdo sde): dmigs kyang / /las rnams byas pa med par mi 'gyur te/ /dkar gnag ji bzhin 'bras bu smin par byed/ /rigs pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di bzang po ste/ /phra zhing mthong dka' rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin/ /gang la yi ge'i tshig kyang mi dmigs pa/ /sangs rgyas
71a2(mdo sde): byang chub nyid ni bcom ldan mkhyen/ /yangs pa'i gzungs dang ye shes bsags pa ste/ /mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang 'byung / /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig spyod yul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bcom ldan rab tu 'chad/ /'di ni na ba nad las thar byed pa/ /byang chub
71a3(mdo sde): sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i nor yin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab tu bsngags/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha yis rab tu mchod/ /skye bo byis pa kun la yang dag ston/ /mu stegs can gyis rtag par yongs su spangs/ /tshul khrims nor ni mchog tu sangs rgyas
71a4(mdo sde): gsungs/ /nam mkha' la ni glog bzhin chags mi 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyal ba bye ba rab mchod cing / /sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pa mkhas pa dang / /sngan chad sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pa dag /de dag gi ni bla med pha rol nor/ /de na dge slong chos smra 'dug pa dag /
71a5(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sras/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i chos 'di thos nas ni/ /'jig rten 'dren par sems kyang bskyed par gyur/ /'dren pa dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po yis/ /chos smra de la yang ni tshig gsungs pa/ /dge slong dngos po mchog
71a6(mdo sde): tu bya dka' yis/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed cig /nor bu rin chen 'dra bar tshul khrims srungs/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i grogs la rtag par sten/ /sdig pa'i grogs la nam yang ma bsten dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /dbang po tog
71a7(mdo sde): gi rgyal mtshan rgyal ba'i drung / /gang gis byang chub sems mchog bskyed pa ni/ /de dag thams cad chos smrar rab 'gyur te/ /tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sras/ /dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //
71b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams
71b2(mdo sde): cad la gdon mi za bar bya'o/ /'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o/ /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang chos la
71b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos dang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa la zhugs par bya'o/ /des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la yang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par
71b4(mdo sde): 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par blangs te gnas na de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa las nges par 'byung bar
71b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom gyi mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas
71b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sngon
71b7(mdo sde): byung 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba 'dir/ /g.yel ba med pa'i khye'u mchog gnyis byung ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas/ /bse ru bzhin du nags khrod stug por gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob/ /snyan dngags bstan
72a1(mdo sde): bcos mkhas shing rdzogs pa ste/ /bar snang gi ni rjes dang sa yang rig /de dag nam mkha' la yang thogs med 'gro/ /de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba der/ /me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas gang / /bya yang sna tshogs mang
72a2(mdo sde): pos bsnyen pa der/ /phan tshun du ni gtam dag rab tu smra/ /rgyal po 'chor zhing song song na/ /sgra grags nas ni nags tshal der 'ongs te/ /rgyal pos chos smra de gnyis mthong nas ni/ /de la mchog tu dga' ba nye bar bzhag /de dang rjes su 'thun pa'i
72a3(mdo sde): gtam byas nas/ /de dag rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / /rgyal po de yi dmag mang mtha' yas pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig drug cu nye bar lhags/ /de nas chos smra de dag so so nas/ /rgyal po de la smras pa rgyal rigs nyon/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed par dka'/ /
72a4(mdo sde): sa yi bdag po rtag tu bag yod gyis/ /tshe ni rtag tu 'gro zhing mi gnas te/ /ri yi chu bo bzhin du myur du 'gro/ /nad dang mya ngan rga bas gzir ba la/ /khyod la dge ba'i lam 'dra skyabs gzhan med/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos rnams bskyang bar gyis/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i
72a5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di yang srungs/ /zad pa'i dus la shin tu 'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas gyis/ /de ltar de tshe mkhas pa de dag gis/ /rnam pa du mar mi dbang gdams pa byas/ /rgyal po khrag khrig drug cur bcas pa yis/ /de tshe byang chub tu ni
72a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /de tshe rgyal po'i glang po chos thos nas/ /des shing dge ba'i chos rnams smra ba la/ /rangs shing yid bde dga' ba rab skyes nas/ /rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal de nas song / /rgyal po de yi dge slong mang po dag /rnyed pa 'dod cing de yi khyim du 'jug /
72a7(mdo sde): de dag de mi 'dra ba'i spyod mthong nas/ /de la rgyal po de ltar ri mo med/ /bstan pa de yang ston pa 'das pa yi/ /de tshe lo yi tha mar gyur pa ste/ /'dzam bu'i gling na snod gyur rab tu nyung / /ma bsdams pa dag shin tu mang po byung / /de nas dge slong mang po brkam zhing chags/ /
72b1(mdo sde): rnyed pa 'dod cing dmigs pa'i lta ba can/ bde gshegs bstan pa rab tu zhig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po de yang bsgyur cing byed du bcug /chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par gyis/ /'di dag mu stegs chad par smra ba ste/ /yun ring spyod par yang dag 'dzud byed kyang / /
72b2(mdo sde): de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'da' mi ston/ /las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig /tshul 'chos 'di dag phung po med ces smra/ /rgyal po 'di dag yul nas spangs nas ni/ /'dir yang chos ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni tshig thos de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang
72b3(mdo sde): po the tshom byung bar gyur/ /chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par bya/ /btang snyoms bzhag na gnod par 'gyur srid snyam/ /rgyal po de phyir 'brang ba lha mo zhig /tshe rabs snga mar lhan cig spyod pa spyad/ /yun ring dus nas phan 'dod mkhas pa ste/ /de yis rgyal po de la 'di skad
72b4(mdo sde): smras/ /rgyal rigs sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig dag gis/ /'di lta bu yi sems ni ma skyed cig /dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'di/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gis ma spong shig /de dag gis ni nags khrod ci bshad pa/ /shin tu 'jigs pa mi bzad dus
72b5(mdo sde): kyi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis/ /mi yi bdag po cung zad mi dran nam/ /rgyal po yang dag tshig gis bskul ba yis/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi gtong gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po'i nu bo ma rungs pa/ /nyen kor rgyal po byed pa des rbad de/ /rgyal po khyod
72b6(mdo sde): kyi gcen ni sdig pa can/ /bdag gi srog kyang nam du 'dod mi byed/ /dge slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa/ /de dag nam mkha' la yang sngags kyis 'gro/ /de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ong / /thams cad 'dus te gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /rig sngags drag ldan
72b7(mdo sde): 'di gnyis myur du sod/ /phyis gdod 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so/ /de tshe rgyal po'i glang po go bgos nas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis der chas te/ /rgyal po dmag sde kun gyis yongs bskor nas/ /nags nas dge slong gang na yod par lhags/ /rgyal po mi zad
73a1(mdo sde): drag shul sems rig nas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin nags der gnas pa yis/ /rdo dang so phag char phab phyir bskrad de/ /des ni rgyal po sde dang bcas pa btags/ /ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis ni/ /de tshe ma rungs rgyal po 'chi dus byas/ /chos
73a2(mdo sde): smra dag la khro ba byas pas na/ /der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song / /rgyal rigs rgyal po gang gis rbad pa yi/ /dge slong dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang / /tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas su/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /lha mo
73a3(mdo sde): gang gis rgyal po bskul bstan cing / /gang gis chos smra de dag bsrungs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa mthong / /spyad pa spyod cing de dag mchod pa byas/ /bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pas/ /rgyal po dang ni lhan cig chos thos shing / /byang chub tu
73a4(mdo sde): ni sems mchog bskyed pa dag / 'jig rten khams mang du yang sangs rgyas gyur/ /de dag tshe tshad bskal pa bye ba mang / /de dag ye shes gzhal med bsam mi khyab/ /de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin bzang po 'di/ /bshad nas rkang gnyis gtso bo mya ngan 'das/ /
73a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims tshangs pa yon tan ye shes bsags/ /bla na med pa'i tshig 'di thos nas ni/ /g.yeng ba med par bag yod spyod cig dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /phyogs bcu dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /sems zhi snying rje byams
73a6(mdo sde): pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen mthong / /'jig rten kun tu chos kyi char 'bebs 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yang / /gzhan yin snyam na de ltar mi blta ste/ /mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyur/ /de tshe
73a7(mdo sde): chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no/ /gang gis rjes su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa/ /rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur/ /lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang byung ba/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de tshe der gyur to/ /rgyal po de yi nu bo gang byung ba/ /dge slong chos smra 'di gnyis sod cig ces/ /
73b1(mdo sde): dge slong rnyed pa 'dod pas rbad pa ni/ /lha sbyin de yi tshe na der gyur to/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
73b2(mdo sde): po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu lus dang srog la chags pa'i phyir sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon
73b3(mdo sde): par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang srog la ma chags pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/ gzhon nu de lta bas na lus dang srog la yang ma chags par bya'o/ /
73b4(mdo sde): zhes de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu khor mor rnag gi lus 'di la/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu chags byed de/ /srog la 'ju zhing bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ /mi mkhas pa dag rtag tu sdig pa byed/ /su dag snying po med pa'i lus srog la/ /
73b5(mdo sde): lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa/ /de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste/ /byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs/ /su dag bdag med stong pa'i lus rnams dang / /srog kyang rmi lam g.yo ba zil pa 'dra/ /'di gnyis la ni chags par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dag shi
73b6(mdo sde): 'phos sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /lus nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang
73b7(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin te/ gzugs kyi skus rab
74a1(mdo sde): tu phye ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/
74a2(mdo sde): rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ bsgom par bya bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams brgya pa las skyes pa'i blo dang don gcig tu bstan pa yin
74a3(mdo sde): te/ chos las skyes pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ zab pa tshad med pa tshad med pa'i chos mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pa/ mi g.yo ba mi gnas pa shin tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ mi snang ba mig gi lam las
74a4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa ni chos kyi skur rab tu shes par bya ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa'i sa dang bral ba/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi skyod pa/ spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la smon par 'dod pa
74a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra las shin tu 'das pa'i snying po ste 'dod chags las yang dag par 'das pa/ dbyer mi phyed pa ste zhe sdang las yang dag par 'das pa brtan pa ste/ gti mug las yang dag par 'das pa stong pa nyid du bstan pas nges par bstan pa ma skyes pa skye ba las yang dag par 'das
74a6(mdo sde): pa/ tha snyad du brtags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa bye brag med pa/ sgras mya ngan las 'das pa dbyangs kyis zhi ba/ brdas mtshungs par gyur pa/ don dam pas brdar gyur pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba'i tshig gis don dam pa/ yongs su gdung ba med pas bsil ba/
74a7(mdo sde): gnas med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ kha dog bstan pas mu med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'di
74b1(mdo sde): 'dra'i 'jig rten mgon po'i sku/ /su dag shes par 'dod pa ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni sgom gyis dang / /sangs rgyas sku ni shes par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste/ /bsod nams brgya skyes 'od kyang gsal/ /de ni bar snang mtshungs pa ste/ /de la tha dad bya ba med/ /
74b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /mtshan rnams kyang ni de 'dra ste/ /de yi mtshan rnams ci 'dra ba/ /de yi sku yang de 'dra'o/ /sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing / /stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang / /de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /
74b3(mdo sde): de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon po'i de 'dra bas/ /sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /mang po dag kyang 'di skad smra/ /ngas ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong / /sku yang gser gyi kha dog la/ /'jig rten thams cad snang
74b4(mdo sde): bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang / /mthu dang rnam par sprul pa yis/ /de ltar mtshan gyis spras pa yi/ /sku dag shin tu snang ba yin/ /bongs tshod khrun dang sboms su yang / /sangs rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyis/ /sku yi tshad ni ma rnyed de/ /de phyir bsam gyis mi
74b5(mdo sde): khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'di tsam zhes/ /gal te tshad kyang rnyed gyur na/ /lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang / /ston pa bye brag med par 'gyur/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi ni/ /rnam par smin pa'ang de yi mtshan/ /ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra mtshan/ /rnam par
74b6(mdo sde): dag cing 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pa ltar/ /sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/ /nam yang goms par ma byas so/ /dkar po'i chos ni mang po yis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bas/ /
74b7(mdo sde): nga yi lus kyang mi snang ngo / /gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyi ni/ /ming dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra/ /ming dang gzugs la gang gi ni/ /'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang / /skal pa mi mnyam 'du shes
75a1(mdo sde): kyis/ /rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /ming dang gzugs la su dag gi/ /'du shes phra mo 'jug pa ni/ /ming dang gzugs la ma chags pas/ /sems ni rab tu 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ngas dran sngon gyi tshe rabs ni/ /grangs med pa dag bdun du yang / /
75a2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i 'du shes gsum po dag /nam yang skyes par ma gyur to/ /nga yi sems ni zag med de/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang / /nga yi lus ni mi snang ngo / /ji ltar gang gi dngos po las/ /yid kyang rnam par grol gyur pa/ /de dag
75a3(mdo sde): de yi dngos po dang / /phyir yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po kun las rnam pa kun/ /nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /phyir yang ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du/ /nga yi sprul pa dag kyang 'gro/ /sems can
75a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi don kyang byed/ /de la lus kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin du/ /nga yi sku yang brjod med cing / /shes par dka' bar rab tu bstan/ /dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku/ /sku ni chos las skyes pa ste/ /gzugs
75a5(mdo sde): kyi skur ni nam du yang / /rgyal ba gdags par yong mi nus/ /ji ltar bshad pa 'di dag kyang / /thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de la sdig can bdud kyis kyang / /klan ka rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /zab mo yi ni chos thos nas/ /de la skrag pa mi 'byung ste/ /de ni srog
75a6(mdo sde): gi phyir du yang / /sangs rgyas byang chub spong mi byed/ /mdo sde bye ba phrag stong gi/ /yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du song bar yang / /'jig rten dag la snang bar 'gyur/ /gzhon nu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang las kyis kyang shes
75a7(mdo sde): par sla ba ma yin te/ sngon po'am kha dog sngon po'am/ sngon po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba'am/ ser po'am/ kha dog ser po'am/ ser po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od ser po 'byung ba'am/ dmar po'am/ kha dog dmar po'am/ dmar po lta bur
75b1(mdo sde): ston pa'am/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba'am/ dkar po'am/ kha dog dkar po'am/ dkar po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba'am/ le brgan nam/ kha dog le brgan nam/ le brgan lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od le brgan 'byung ba'am/ shel lam/ shel gyi kha
75b2(mdo sde): dog gam/ shel lta bur ston pa'am/ shel gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ me'am/ me'i kha dog gam/ me lta bur ston pa'am/ me'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ mar gyi snying po'am/ mar gyi kha dog gam/ mar lta bur ston pa'am/ mar gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ gser ram/ gser gyi
75b3(mdo sde): kha dog gam/ gser lta bur ston pa'am/ gser gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ bai dUr+ya'am/ bai dUr+ya'i kha dog gam/ bai dUr+ya lta bur ston pa'am/ bai dUr+ya'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ glog gam/ glog gi kha dog gam/ glog lta bur ston pa'am/ glog gi 'od 'byung ba'am/ tshangs
75b4(mdo sde): pa'am/ tshangs pa'i kha dog gam/ tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am/ tshangs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ lha'am/ lha'i kha dog gam/ lha lta bur ston pa'am/ lha'i 'od 'byung ba'o/ /zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dag pa ste/ mtshan
75b5(mdo sde): ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa/ mtshan ma thams cad kyis kyang bstan par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par lha dang bcas
75b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang gzugs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pas sku'i tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams kyi rdul phran dang / /rdul du ming yang ston pa dang / /mtshe'u dang rdzing dang
75b7(mdo sde): lting ka dang / /rgya mtsho na yang ji snyed chu/ /'di snyed rdul phran yod do zhes/ /de dag la ni mtha' mi rnyed/ /rgya mtsho la ni skra rtse yis/ /chu thigs gzhal bar nus kyang ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i dpe nyid du/ /yang dag bstan par mi rung ngo / /chu yi thigs pa
76a1(mdo sde): dpag med cing / /de bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul/ /de bas sems can gcig gi yang / /shin tu mang du ngas mthong ste/ /mos pa dang ni sems bskyed pa/ /du ma dag ni shes mi sla/ /ngas ni sku yi yon tan dag /yang dag pa ni gang bstan pa/ /sems
76a2(mdo sde): can kun gyi mos pa yang / /de dag dpe ru bzod mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang / /kha dog snang ba 'di 'dra zhes/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni shes mi nus/ /nga yi bye brag de 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /zab cing
76a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa ste/ /de phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bsam du med/ /sku de bsam du med pa yi/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /sangs rgyas sku ni sems kyis kyang / /bsam par bzod pa ma yin te/ /
76a4(mdo sde): de ltar de yi sku la yang / /tshad kyang nye bar mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams de dag dpag tu med/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pas na/ /de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni/ /'od gsal bsam du med pa grub/ /sems can kun gyis gzung du med/ /tshad kyis gzung bya ma yin
76a5(mdo sde): te/ /de lta sangs rgyas sku dag ni/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /tshad med pa yi chos dag gis/ /de la tshad ni brtag tu med/ /ma brtags pa yi chos dag gis/ /de ltar sangs rgyas ma brtags so/ /rtog pa dag ni tshad du bstan/ /rtog pa
76a6(mdo sde): med pa tshad med yin/ /mi rtog rtog dang bral bas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas bsam du med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' tshad med la/ /sus kyang gzhal du mi nus pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang / /nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra zhing mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas sku ni
76a7(mdo sde): de lta bur/ /gang gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
76b1(mdo sde): kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas kyang bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya bar 'dod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang chos
76b2(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag
76b3(mdo sde): par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par bya'o/ /gzhon nu de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/
76b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang de snyed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ji snyed pa dang gzhon nu rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang
76b5(mdo sde): de snyed de/ gzhon nu de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gzhon nu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa
76b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /gzhon nu de ltar 'dus byas la 'ang nyes pa grangs med/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang phan yon grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
76b7(mdo sde): bsngags pa yang grangs med do/ /gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa yang de snyed do/ /gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan 'das pa'i ming grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa yang grangs med do/ /
77a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste/ de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dbyangs
77a2(mdo sde): brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ gzhon nu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni
77a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhi po de dag nyid de/ de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu 'di
77a4(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis
77a5(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
77a6(mdo sde): rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo
77a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed nges
77b1(mdo sde): par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu
77b2(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa
77b3(mdo sde): dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i
77b4(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas
77b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis
77b6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub
77b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba
78a1(mdo sde): lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab
78a2(mdo sde): pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi
78a3(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
78a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab
78a5(mdo sde): pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam
78a6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i
78a7(mdo sde): rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste/
78b1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi
78b2(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
78b3(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
78b4(mdo sde): dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed btags pa'i tshig
78b5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni
78b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par
78b7(mdo sde): byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i tshig
79a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
79a2(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang
79a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba spyad pa'i tshig
79a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
79a5(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi
79a6(mdo sde): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi
79a7(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba med
79b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs
79b2(mdo sde): su bshad pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig
79b3(mdo sde): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig
79b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab
79b5(mdo sde): pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed
79b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /
79b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig
80a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs
80a2(mdo sde): su bshad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
80a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di
80a4(mdo sde): bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs
80a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du
80a6(mdo sde): byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
80a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
80b1(mdo sde): 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ /'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs
80b2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab
80b3(mdo sde): pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
80b4(mdo sde): nor bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
80b5(mdo sde): nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam
80b6(mdo sde): par byang ba'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
80b7(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du
81a1(mdo sde): byed yongs su bshad pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
81a2(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
81a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi lam bsgom pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i lam
81a4(mdo sde): bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa
81a5(mdo sde): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
81a6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes
