121b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang yongs su dri ba dang / gzung ba dang tshig gis go bar byed nus shing dge slong chos smra ba de/ sems can dag gi g.yo ba dang spyod lam dang mos pa dang khams dang bag chags la mkhas te/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes shing
121b7(mdo sde): khams dang bag chags la yang mkhas/ bden pa dang mtshams sbyar ba la yang mkhas/ mtshams dbral ba dang tshig gi lan gtan la dbab pa la yang mkhas/ spobs pa zab cing sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la yang mkhas/ gsong por smra zhing bzhin la khro gnyer med pa/
122a1(mdo sde): sems chen por gyur pa la gnas pa/ snying rje chen po la brtson pa/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa yin no/ /gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs kyi bu mo skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa/ byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/
122a2(mdo sde): kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa ye shes ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba yin te/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par gzengs stod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ yang
122a3(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/ /gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba de'i brla gnyis la 'brum bu me dbal nag po chen po gso dka' zhing sman dkon pa zhig byung ste/ na ba de sman pa dag gis spangs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor
122a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa sras dang sras mo dang zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa dge slong de na bar rig nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma byung ngo / /bud med brgyad khrir bcas pa dang grong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams su bcas pa dang yul 'khor ba dang grong 'dab pa dang yul gyi mi dang rtsis pa dang blon po dang blon po chen po dang
122a5(mdo sde): sgo ba dang 'khor rnams su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong de na bar thos nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma 'byin te/ dge slong 'di 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes skad 'dzer to/ /gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes stobs la lha mo sngon snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa
122a6(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ de rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bas rmi lam du bstan pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te dge slong 'di la mi'i sha dang khrag sar pa ma rul pas 'brum bu me dbal nag po 'di la byugs te/ mi'i sha sar pa ma rul pa las ro sna tshogs su g.yos byas te byin na dge slong 'di
122a7(mdo sde): nad 'di las 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs mtshan mo de 'das pa dang gnyid kyis log pa las sad de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs nas rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bzlas te/ nga'i rmi lam 'di lta bu zhig mthong ngo
122b1(mdo sde): zhes bzlas nas go bar byas na/ gzhon nu de ltar bud med kyi khyim de dang rgyal po'i pho brang de nas dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do/ /rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan yang rmi lam de lta bu zhig rmis nas sad pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ste/ rmi lam gyi rnam pa de
122b2(mdo sde): dag ma dang zhabs 'bring ba rnams la gtam byas kyang dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do/ /de nas rgyal po'i sras mo ye shes ldan de dga' zhing mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur brtson par byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis rtsi
122b3(mdo sde): 'di dag bdag gi lus las bcad de ji skad bstan pa bzhin du khrag sar pa dang sha sar pa sbyin par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang na bdag ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhon zhing chung ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes
122b4(mdo sde): btsal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la bdag gi lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/ dge slong 'di ci nas nad 'di las sos par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan de rang gi gnas su song nas mtshon rnon po thogs te chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis
122b5(mdo sde): bdag gi brla las sha bcad nas/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gya nom par g.yos byas nas/ khrag kyang thogs te 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ khrag gis 'brum bu me dbal nag po de byugs nas/ g.yos legs par byas pa'i zas de
122b6(mdo sde): dge slong de zar bcug ste/ 'drangs par byed cing legs par bstabs so/ /de nas dge slong de mi shes ma rig ma dogs pas zas de zos so/ /zas de zos ma thag tu dge slong de'i na tsha thams cad med par gyur te nad de thams cad kyang sos so/ /de yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing bde ba
122b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pas de lta de lta bur chos bstan te/ btsun mo'i 'khor de dang grong pa dang yul mi dang yul 'khor ba 'dus pa de dag las srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyis bdag gi bu mo la tshigs
123a1(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed/ /mi yi sha 'di dag kyang gang nas blangs/ /bu mo khyod kyis kha zas 'di byas pas/ /chos smra 'di yang 'di ltar bde bar gyur/ /sna tshogs bro dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa/ /bsad pa yin nam
123a2(mdo sde): de ste shi ba rnyed/ /bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed/ /des ni sdig pa'i nad las 'di thar byas/ /bu mo des ni pha yi tshig thos nas/ /bu mo ye shes ldan gyis 'di skad smras/ /zhum sems med par tshig kyang rab smras te/ /bdag ni ci mchi yab khyod gsan du gsol/ /lha
123a3(mdo sde): yis bstan pa'i rmi lam dag / bdag gis mthong bar gyur to yab/ /sa yi bdag po bdag la gson/ /yang dag don ni mkhyen par mdzod/ /lha des bdag la 'di skad ston/ /mi yi sha dang khrag rnams ni/ /dge slong 'di la sus byin na/ /sdig pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur/ /
123a4(mdo sde): bdag ni mal nas langs nas su/ /btsun mo'i 'khor du mchis nas ni/ /bdag gis de tshe rmi lam rnams/ /ma yi gtso la bzlas shing smras/ /bran mo rnams la bdag gis bsgo/ /'di lta bu dag su byed nus/ /mi yi khrag dang sha rnams ni/ /khu bar btsos pa
123a5(mdo sde): g.yos byas te/ /zas su rab tu sbyin bya zhing / /khrag dag gis kyang byugs nas su/ /me dbal nag po 'di las kyang / /dge slong ji ltar thar bar bya/ /cho ga myur du ma byas na/ /rtsi sman dag ni ma byas pas/ /dge slong 'di ni nad 'di yis/ /myur du 'chi ba'i dus
123a6(mdo sde): byed 'gyur/ /rang gi sha dang khrag gtong ba/ /srid pa gsum na sems can gang / /mkhas pa su zhig 'di mthong nas/ /lus la yang ni gnas par byed/ /btsun mo'i 'khor du bdag gis go bar bgyis/ /bud med gcig kyang sbyin zhes mi mchi nas/ /bdag la dge
123a7(mdo sde): slong de phangs bdag phangs kyang / /byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sha khrag btang / /byang chub zhi ba mya ngan med tshol ba/ /de dag lus la mos shing rten pa min/ /bdag nyid la yang rdul tsam phangs pa med/ /bdag nyid btang yang yid ni mi dga' med/ /btsun mo'i 'khor
123b1(mdo sde): rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad rmugs pa bzhin du gyur/ /bya ba de dag sbyar bar ni/ /su yang spro bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa/ /dge slong 'di ni zas byin te/ /bdag gi sha yang bcad nas ni/ /khrag rnams kyis kyang bsku bar bya/ /bdag gi
123b2(mdo sde): brla las sha bcad de/ /sha rnams dang ni khrag blangs nas/ /sha yi sna gu bdag gis bskal/ /bro ba sna tshogs g.yos legs bgyis/ /dge slong na ba de la ni/ /mi sha yi ni kha zas dang / /khrag rnams kyis kyang byug pa dag /bdag gis yab kyi spyan sngar stsal/ /mi yi bdag
123b3(mdo sde): po bdag gi tshig la gson/ /sa bdag mi sha dag ni ma rnyed nas/ /bdag gi brla las sha dag bcad nas su/ /de bsgrubs chos smra 'di la stsal pa lags/ /bdag gis bla med byang chub don phyir du/ /rang gi lus kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis/ /dge slong 'di yang thar
123b4(mdo sde): bgyis mi bde med/ /bdag gi bsod nams dag ni tshad med bgyis/ /bu mo de la rgyal pos 'di skad smras/ /bu mo khyod kyis rtsir ni bya ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar lus las rang gi sha bcad na/ /khyod kyi lus la na tshar ma gyur tam/ /rgyal po'i bu mo blo ldan 'jigs med pas/ /de tshe
123b5(mdo sde): smras pa rgyal po sa bdag gson/ /las kyi rnam smin bsam yas de 'dra bas/ /de dag gsan nas tshul bzhin mkhyen par mdzod/ /yab cig sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis pa yis/ /sems can sems dmyal mi bzad ltung gyur te/ /sha med gyur nas phyir yang sha dag skye/ /
123b6(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab gzigs/ /sdig pa'i las kyis sha khrag med gyur cing / /skad cig tu yang sha khrag 'byung 'gyur na/ /dge ba'i las dang mos pa de dag las/ /sha dang khrag rnams skye ba smos ci 'tshal/ /sha bcad bdag la na tsha ma mchis te/ /khrag
123b7(mdo sde): phyung bdag la g.yo ba yong ma mchis/ /bdag gi sha rnams thams cad bcad na yang / /chos kyi lus la rma dang skyon ma mchis/ /bdag gis chos la dga' ba mchog bskyed nas/ /rang gi brla las sha bcad rab tu stsal/ /rma dang sdug bsngal bdag la ma mchis te/ /bdag
124a1(mdo sde): gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du gyur/ /'di 'dra ba yi chos smra 'di lta bu/ /brgya lam na yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung / /yab cig u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /bskal pa bye ba mang la res 'ga' gda'/ /ji ltar 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser 'bar ba/ /sems can lta bas
124a2(mdo sde): ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin du ni chos smra de 'dra ba/ /lha dang mi dag mthong bas chog mi shes/ /skye bo skom pa dang ba'i chu 'thungs nas/ /skom pas gdungs pa skom pa med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos smra mkhas pa 'di dag kyang / /chos kyi bdud rtsis srog chags sred pa
124a3(mdo sde): sel/ /dge slong mi bzad na ba 'di la yang / /sha dang khrag ni bdag gis rab tu btang / /chos smra ba ni me dbal rab zhi ste/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i rim gro bgyis/ /mang du thos shing spyod dang ldan pa ste/ /ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni 'dzin pa la/ /'di ltar bdag
124a4(mdo sde): gis rang gi sha btang bas/ /chos 'di rnams kyang bdag gis thob par shog /ji ltar spos rab dri zhim yid 'ong ba/ /dus 'brang dang ni tsan dan dmar po yi/ /dri dag phyogs bcu rnams su ldang ba ltar/ /chos smra de yi dri yang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar ri rab phyogs su rab snang
124a5(mdo sde): zhing / /kun nas mdzes pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /phyogs su rab tu snang zhing gsal bar bgyid/ /de bzhin chos smra 'di yang ri rab 'dra/ /ji ltar mchod rten la la zhig pa ni/ /skyes bu mkhas pas bcos shing slar bslang ste/ /mchod rten de la dad par bgyid pa ni/ /
124a6(mdo sde): de ltar bslang ba de yang de yi rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang / /chos la gus par rang gi sha dang ni/ /khrag gis byug pa dag gis thar bar bgyis/ /'dzam bu'i gling du bdag gis mar me bltam/ /dge slong 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus bgyis na/ /'dzam bu'i gling du
124a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin sgra yang ni/ /sems can rnams la rtag tu nub par 'gyur/ /'di gsos pas ni ting 'dzin rnams kyang 'thob/ /dge slong 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi skyabs/ /'jig rten ldongs pa dag la mig sbyin pa/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug la/ /sman
124b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po chen po gso bar bgyid/ /chen por gyur par rtag tu sems gnas te/ /de yi spyod pa dag ni tshad mi rnyed/ /nges pa'i don dang tshig la shin tu bslabs/ /pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil mi non/ /chos smra ba la rim gro mchog bgyis pas/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag ni stong du
124b2(mdo sde): yang / /bdag la phyir yang log ltung 'jigs ma mchis/ /bud med dngos por bdag ni phyis mi 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na shin tu dka' ba spyad pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos
124b3(mdo sde): 'di thos nas chos smra ba na ba la sman shin tu dkon pas rim gro bya ba la brtson zhing bdag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang rim gror byas te/ tha na sor mo gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchod rten la rim gror bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung
124b4(mdo sde): ba'i gtam nges par bstan pa 'di rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing / /rin chen bkang nas 'dren la phul ba bas/ /gang gis rkang pa'i sor mo gcig byin na/ /de bas bsod nams mchog 'di bye
124b5(mdo sde): brag 'phags/ /bu mo de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar gyur/ /kun gyi bstan pa la yang rab byung nas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag thams cad ni/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa phyi dus na/ /de ni
124b6(mdo sde): rtag par rab tu byung gyur te/ /bde gshegs sras mo kun nas nyon mongs med/ /mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /bstan pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /der yang bud med dngos po bsgyur nas su/ /de tshe de ni dge slong chos smrar gyur/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos
124b7(mdo sde): ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /mi dbang ye shes stobs ni byams pa yin/ /mar me mdzad ni chos smra der gyur te/ /de tshe nga ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/ /lha mo sngon gyi snag gi gnyen gyur pa/ /mi dbang ye shes stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing / /rgyal po'i rmi lam du yang ston pa ni/ /
125a1(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /g.yo sgyu thams cad yongs su spangs nas su/ /bdag gi sha dag dang ni khrag gis kyang / /chos smra ba la ngas kyang rim gror byas/ /dge slong na ba na tshas gzir ba de/ /
125a2(mdo sde): gang dag mthong nas de tshe ngus pa yang / /phyir mi ldog par de dag rab gyur te/ /log par ltung ba'i sar ni yong ma song / /de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med/ /klad pa'i nad med rna ba'i nad med de/ /sna yi nad med lce yi nad kyang med/ /so yang na bar nams kyang ma gyur to/ /
125a3(mdo sde): dge slong na ba de tshe sus bsnyen pa/ /de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis lus kyang 'bar/ /de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas/ /rab tu 'jig dus byang chub dam pa 'di/ /de bzhin
125a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog 'di legs par bzung nas su/ /rtag tu ri mo byas shing bcang byas na/ /de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni/ /mi yi gtso bo mi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur/ /
125a5(mdo sde): de dag spyod pa bla med 'di thos nas/ /dga' ba zang zing med pa 'phags pa 'thob/ /de dag bdag gi sngon spyad thos nas ni/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod pa rgya cher byed/ /dge slong mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan mthong nas/ /g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya/ /zhe sdang
125a6(mdo sde): tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te/ /dge slong chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis/ /gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam spangs la/ /nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod par gyis/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang / /log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re/ /gcig la gcig
125a7(mdo sde): kyang gnod sems byas na ni/ /de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob mi nus/ /bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus/ /sbyin pa mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/ /ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan
125b1(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
125b2(mdo sde): la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir kun dga'
125b3(mdo sde): bo bdag gi stan la 'dug la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
125b4(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs phye'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phye'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan la 'dug
125b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi rgyu gang gi rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa dag lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / rna ba bcad pa dang / sna
125b6(mdo sde): bcad pa dang / mig dbyung ba dang / mgo bcad pa dang lus bcad pa dang yan lag bcad par gyur/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/
125b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na/ ngas sdug bsngal ji snyed myong bar gyur pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran na ci'i phyir de
126a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/ rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la skyes bu la la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/ 'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur
126a2(mdo sde): shog / lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig /dga' bar gyis shig /yongs su spyod cig ces zer na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur
126a3(mdo sde): te/ rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / yongs su spyod par byed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i
126a4(mdo sde): yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba'am sems dga' ba ma byung ngo / /
126a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang tshul
126a6(mdo sde): khrims ma g.yos pa dang tshul khrims ma blangs pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang / tshul khrims mi yang ba dang / tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims mi slu ba dang / tshul khrims drang ba dang / tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang /
126a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin te/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rkang pa bcad pas yongs
126b1(mdo sde): su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ lus dang yan lag bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang mi myong la bla na med pa yang
126b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
126b3(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
126b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yang de'i tshe
126b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to/ /nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang sems can
126b6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ /rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/ /rab tu bkod cing yongs su
126b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das na sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par
127a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ kun dga' bo rgyal po dpa'
127a2(mdo sde): bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /bu ni stong yod do/ /bu mo ni lnga brgya yod do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la
127a3(mdo sde): sgo bzhi yod pa/ stegs bu dang sgo khang dang rta babs dang skar khung dang pu shu dang khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skyed mos tshal gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ lha'i gnas bzhin snang ba/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod
127a4(mdo sde): do/ /kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing skye bo mang pos spangs te/ skye bo mang po dang mi 'phrod cing skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i dus su gyur pa/ gtse ba mang zhing char ches pa'i dus kyi tshe char mi 'bab pa'i
127a5(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe/ dus ma yin par char 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sbrul 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ mu ge 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ log par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su tshol ba'i
127a6(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ljongs nas bskrad nas de dag chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun
127a7(mdo sde): du bzang po zhes bya ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ /kun dga' bo nags khrod de yang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snye ma dang / 'khri shing dang / 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing
127b1(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi yang gzugs dang kha dog du ma dang sa bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ brag dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/ yangs shing mtho ba dang gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa/ grub pa'i rig
127b2(mdo sde): sngags 'chang dang dri za'am skyes bu'am drang srong dang mi'am ci dag gnas pa/ byad gzugs dang kha dog che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/ sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa/ dga' tshal dang 'dra ba kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun
127b3(mdo sde): tu bzang po de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to/ /yang kun dga' bo chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas na/
127b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dir skyes te/ de dag gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ gal te gzungs kyi
127b5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa ma rnyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der song ste phyin
127b6(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni 'gro'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song la sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ /
127b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag gis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod nags khrod 'di nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba 'di ni kho bo cag
128a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dam pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyur na ma legs so/ /tshe dang
128a2(mdo sde): ldan pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzang la blta na sdug ste/ dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan zhing / na tshod dar la bab ste/ mdog ni gser btso ma bzang po 'dra/ dpral ba ni dung dang zla ba dang me tog kun da'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spus brgyan/ skra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthing la
128a3(mdo sde): lcang lor 'khyil pa yin pas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po'am/ de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis khyod kyi srog bcad na ma legs so/ /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho
128a4(mdo sde): bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na kho bos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag tu 'du shes 'di la gnas nas su/ /bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yong
128a5(mdo sde): mi nus/ /mi bzad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yin/ /gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs shing / /sems can 'di dang gang zag smra gnas dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang / /reg bya spong ba de ni bstan pa bsrung / /
128a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /dang ba'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang / /gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i phreng ba yis/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas/ /gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /
128a7(mdo sde): nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa/ /bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos/ /'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom/ /de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin/ /'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/ /khyed
128b1(mdo sde): bde rang gi don gyis la/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis/ /khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas shing / /'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis/ /ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa/ /tshul khrims drang por bsrung bar gyis/ /gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa
128b2(mdo sde): bsrungs pa ni/ /de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas/ /de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod pa yi/ /tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa/ /de
128b3(mdo sde): dag gis ni sems can mang po yang / /sems can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs/ /chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis/ /bzod pa dag kyang rtag tu bsrung gyis la/ /dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par
128b4(mdo sde): gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu rtsod pa ma byed par/ /spyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod/ /bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir/ /grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya/ /blo gros che 'chang sems can dam pa'i mchog /drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang / /
128b5(mdo sde): kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed/ /snying rje bar yang ngu zhing mchi ma zag /mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par/ /sgra 'jam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi/ /shing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtogs pa mdzod/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig /sngon gyi stobs bcu
128b6(mdo sde): 'dren pa de dag kyang / /dbang po zhi zhing shin tu des pa rnams/ /nags tshal brag dang ri yi rtser gshegs nas/ /byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud/ /byang chub rgyur yang spyod pa dam pa spyad/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /de dag rjes slobs nags khrod
128b7(mdo sde): gnas par mdzod/ /brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig /lus ni shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ /khyod kyi skra yang mthon mthing kha dog ste/ /gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od byed pa/ /sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur/ /khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams
129a1(mdo sde): na/ /shin tu mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir/ /phrag dog bskyed nas khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur/ /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ji snyed sngon
129a2(mdo sde): gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni/ /thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad de/ /srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs/ /spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /de yi rjes bslabs byang
129a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang / /sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod/ /drang srong mkhas la kun gyis bskor byas te/ /rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas/ /mi bzad snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing / /nyam thag mi bde cho nges 'bebs par byed/ /kha cig rab tu
129a4(mdo sde): 'gyel cing brgyal nas su/ /sa la lhung ba sA la bcad 'gyel bzhin/ /'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'dod pa/ /bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir mi ldog /drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas/ /ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin/ /de ni chos kyi
129a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gnas pas na/ /de la yon tan nyes par bya ba med/ /'jig rten 'dir na nags khrod bdag gnas pas/ /sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes/ /de ni sems can bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /grong khyer pho brang mchog tu song bar gyur/ /de nas chos smra ba me

129b1(mdo sde): 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen
129b2(mdo sde): ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas kyi

129b6(mdo sde): rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin
129b7(mdo sde): du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro lnga pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do/ /grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na
130a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de nyi ma lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng
130a2(mdo sde): bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de nyi ma drug zas gcad
130a3(mdo sde): pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa
130a4(mdo sde): dang rgyal po dpa' bas byin skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing rta la ngos ni dngul mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor lo ni bai dUr+ya/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shing rta'i
130a5(mdo sde): mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/ de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis pa rnams dga' bar byed
130a6(mdo sde): cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /khyim bdag shing sA la
130a7(mdo sde): chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog thag tu 'gro ste/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
130b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
130b2(mdo sde): tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lham
130b3(mdo sde): rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma lta bur thams cad du/ /'di dag rab tu snang bar
130b4(mdo sde): bgyis/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing / /gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur/ /de tshe zhe sdang khro ba dang / /phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur/ /rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yi/ /zhabs 'bring sras la sogs pa yang / /su
130b5(mdo sde): yang rgyal po mi lta ste/ /su yang zhabs 'bring mi bgyid do/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni/ /skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin/ /rgyal po'i bu yi mdun bdar bas/ /dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur/ /ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag /mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang / /
130b6(mdo sde): sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur/ /mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni/ /grong khyer 'jig pa bdag po mig stong ldan/ /ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum dbang / /de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs
130b7(mdo sde): pa gnas pa 'dra/ /rab 'phrul lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin/ /'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du/ /dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes/ /nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis/ /'od zer stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel/ /phyogs rnams kun tu
131a1(mdo sde): snang bar bgyid pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin/ /tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis/ /bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms/ /de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes/ /
131a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/ /bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen/ /nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed/ /de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun tu gda'/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste/ /dpa' bo 'das
131a3(mdo sde): pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/ /ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags/ /dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig /gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan/ /gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs
131a4(mdo sde): sgra shin tu snyan par gda'/ /rgyal po'i gzi brjid shin tu lham me snang mi bgyid/ /chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing / /sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te/ /bdag cag thams
131a5(mdo sde): cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de dag thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed/ /gser gyi phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang / /rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor/ /ji ltar 'khor
131a6(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag / stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta/ /sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog /gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun tu 'gro/ /rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang / /khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mi/ /de dag gcig la lhag par
131a7(mdo sde): sdug pa med/ /thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par bskyed/ /de bzhin dge slong des pa 'di yang ni/ /gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs/ /byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang / /yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed/ /mtshan
131b1(mdo sde): mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang / /ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin/ /dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas nges pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis ni
131b2(mdo sde): bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas/ /zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni/ /yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de/ /'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang / /bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab
131b3(mdo sde): tu bskor/ /ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu bstan/ /zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad/ /de ni gang na'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu/ /lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
131b4(mdo sde): yon tan gyis/ /rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yong mi nus/ /gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi/ /sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'/ /gser dang gser phye
131b5(mdo sde): dag kyang 'thor bar byed/ /gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed/ /gtsug gi nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag /rin thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas/ /dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni/ /dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin
131b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshogs kyang log go snyam mo/ /skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de
131b7(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang / de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/ de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin tu sdangs par gyur to/ /dge slong
132a1(mdo sde): de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin tu khros so/ /dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis mig gis kyang brda byas so/ /de 'di
132a2(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ da dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zhabs 'bring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas gzhon nu dag dge slong 'di srog dang phrol cig ces byas na/ gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go/ /dge slong
132a3(mdo sde): de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/ bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag na da dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po btsam pa med pa ma rungs
132a4(mdo sde): pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i lam na rgyal po dpa' bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/ /rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed 'dis dge slong 'di
132a5(mdo sde): srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus sam/ dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lha shin
132a6(mdo sde): tu rngo thogs so/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal/ da dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la dbab par shes na mtshon rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig /rna ba dang sna yang chod cig /'dis chags pa'i
132a7(mdo sde): sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyis de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung shig ces byas so/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do/ /rna ba dang sna yang bcad do/ /mig gnyis kyang phyung
132b1(mdo sde): ngo / /de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang rkang lag bcad pa las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung / 'o ma'i rgyun du ma yang byung ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo/ /bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang 'khor lo la sogs
132b2(mdo sde): pa nang nas byung ste skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun tu snang ngo / /de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de lam na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges
132b3(mdo sde): btab ste smre sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo / /de nas rgyal po dpal bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang skyed mos tshal mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'/ mi rtse yongs su mi spyod de/ skyed mos tshal nas de logs nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang rgyal po'i
132b4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las bltas na dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par
132b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar sems pa na/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris sgra skad
132b6(mdo sde): dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro/ /bar snang las lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bag tsha zhing spu zing
132b7(mdo sde): zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe cho nge cher btab nas tshig 'di skad zer ro/ /rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig spang / /bdag nyid mtshon thogs
133a1(mdo sde): bdag nyid 'chi bar bya/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan/ /dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs/ /zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas
133a2(mdo sde): bdag dkrugs te/ /rab tu dga' bar bud med tshogs rnams dang / /shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas dong / /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni/ /'dir byon dge slong de yang mthong nas su/ /bud med tshogs rnams rab tu
133a3(mdo sde): dgar gyur cing / /mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor/ /thams cad sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de la bstod/ /rgyal po yi ni klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams/ /de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas
133a4(mdo sde): ni/ /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na/ /bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe/ /bud med tshogs chen dga' bar lta mthong nas/ /
133a5(mdo sde): rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba bskyed/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu snang bar bgyis pa ni/ /zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas/ /bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin/ /bdag gis der ni gtum po'i tshig smras te/ /bu
133a6(mdo sde): stong dag la nga nyid khyod song la/ /dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis/ /'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa/ /gzhon nu thams cad mnyen zhing tshul ldan te/ /bdag la phan sems dge slong de la 'dud/ /rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung / /de tshe bdag ni mya ngan
133a7(mdo sde): non par gyur/ /dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa/ /byams ldan pha bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod du btang / /phyi dus bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg /dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas/ /ma rungs las bgyid
133b1(mdo sde): mi la sdug bsngal skyed/ /bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar des bgyis te/ /me tog phreng brgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs/ /nags mchog kun tu bzang po dga' ba na/ /bya yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas/ /de na dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba/ /bu gcig pa ni ma dang bral
133b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin/ /dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod/ /mi yi don kyang shin tu rgya cher bgyis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe/ /dge slong shin tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/ /lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs/ /g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdug mdzes
133b3(mdo sde): pa gzhan/ /lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs/ /dge slong bzhengs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod/ /rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang / /dge slong rab tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi srog gi
133b4(mdo sde): bar chad 'gyur du dogs/ /ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa/ /srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas/ /g.yangs chen por mchongs te sar lhung ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa/ /byad
133b5(mdo sde): bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'gyel bar gyur/ /me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur rlags/ /me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba/ /chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang / /dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir gyur te/ /
133b6(mdo sde): mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde/ /me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra/ /'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad/ /bdag gis dngos sdig shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /mgon
133b7(mdo sde): med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi/ /'dir yang dge slong dum bur rlags pa yis/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring / /bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na/ /bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur/ /blon po dang ni zhabs 'bring bkrabs
134a1(mdo sde): pa yang / /de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi/ /ded dpon stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams/ /rdo rje stug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su mchi/ /der ni dge slong dum
134a2(mdo sde): bur byas mthong nas/ /lha rnams rab tu snying rje cho nges 'debs/ /de dag der song dge 'dun go bar byas/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de/ /mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems dpa'
134a3(mdo sde): gzungs la gnas pa de/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin/ /tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon med gang srung zhing / /'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med bzod sgom pa/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal
134a4(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing / /zhum med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing / /de bzhin srog la ma chags gyur nas ni/ /kun
134a5(mdo sde): tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nas su/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lha yi cho nge'i snying rje thos nas ni/ /dge slong de kun shin tu sdug bsngal nas/ /me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la/ /lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags/ /des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab
134a6(mdo sde): 'ongs nas/ /dge slong dum bu dum bur byas mthong ste/ /nyam thag skad kyis mi bzad cho nges 'debs/ /de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/ /dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smra/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams pa yi/ /dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas/ /
134a7(mdo sde): 'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam yas dran/ /'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin/ /'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes/ /'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston/ /'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs/ /'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ /'di ni nges shing
134b1(mdo sde): dbang po rab tu zhi/ /'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis/ /khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas/ /dag cing rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che/ /
134b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa ngan cing btsog la sdug bsngal skyed/ /mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste/ /'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur/ /mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod/ /'dod pa bsnyen byas
134b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan pa gsod/ /de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spang / /rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas/ /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro/ /'di 'dra'i dge
134b4(mdo sde): slong mkhas pa gsod byed de/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar bya/ /lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang / /reg bya
134b5(mdo sde): chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong / /sbyin la bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med/ /bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te/ /bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song / /sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed/ /'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang / /byams
134b6(mdo sde): pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta/ /de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang / /byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur/ /rta dang bal glang yang thogs khri rnams dang / /khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/ /glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang / /grong dang yul 'khor dga' ba
134b7(mdo sde): gtong bar byed/ /grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing / /gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang / /de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang / /rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs/ /me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang / /rol
135a1(mdo sde): mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs thogs nas ni/ /dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed/ /srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang / /srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed/ /de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar
135a2(mdo sde): byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams/ /gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te/ /khams gsum dag la snga nas chags pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /bdag tu
135a3(mdo sde): 'du shes sems can 'du shes med/ /srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med/ /tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med/ /bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med/ /grangs su
135a4(mdo sde): 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med/ /bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med/ /grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /
135a5(mdo sde): yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes med/ /'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med/ /zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med/ /gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du
135a6(mdo sde): shes med/ /ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes med/ /lta dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te/ /byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med/ /khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu
135a7(mdo sde): spong / /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med/ /gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed/ /blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed/ /su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni/ /de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa/ /
135b1(mdo sde): 'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag /bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes/ /mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye/ /de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin/ /zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur/ /dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung / /'di gnyis rab tu rnam par
135b2(mdo sde): spang byas te/ /blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs/ /de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni/ /'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab gnas shing / /tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /
135b3(mdo sde): ral ba med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med/ /nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag /'phags shing 'dres pa dag tu mi 'gyur te/ /mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas/ /blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge
135b4(mdo sde): 'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni/ /sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras
135b5(mdo sde): bus mdzes/ /dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan/ /sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin/ /gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan/ /mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag /grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed/ /
135b6(mdo sde): nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs/ /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram/ /ud pal pad mos brgyan cing chu yang 'bab/ /'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba/ /drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun
135b7(mdo sde): pa dag / bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas/ /sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon/ /de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di/ /me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te/ /byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis bkrongs/ /'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal
136a1(mdo sde): bar ltung / /byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang / /dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod/ /de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o/ /gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang / /
136a2(mdo sde): gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste/ /zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
136a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang / /srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de/ /
136a4(mdo sde): rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la/ /sems can gang dag chags pa ni/ /shin tu ma rungs las byas nas/ /gti mug dbang song de dag ni/ /sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par/ /mi mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song / /dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni/ /chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la/ /mi
136a5(mdo sde): gang chags par mi byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag
136a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas te/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de dper na dben pa na bde bar gnas pa dang dgon pa dang / nags
136a7(mdo sde): khrod spangs te grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
136b1(mdo sde): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /ngas sngon
136b2(mdo sde): spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya/ /skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur/ /shing rtar zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong / /kun nas mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos
136b3(mdo sde): pa/ /phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed/ /me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste/ /snying rje gnas pa phan zhing snying brtse ba/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni/ /sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs/ /nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas/ /
136b4(mdo sde): de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes/ /'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas na/ /'di ni bdag gi srid las skyod snyam ste/ /nga yi bu rnams stong du tshang ba yang / /shing rtar zhugs shing zhabs 'bring mthon dman 'gro/ /cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sum cu dbang
136b5(mdo sde): phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin/ /de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag /nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug /mgo rgyan dang ni lhab lhub rgyan gyis spud/ /de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta 'dren/ /nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang / /gzugs mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag /
136b6(mdo sde): shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/ /ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba/ /mthong nas de dag phar yang 'du shes bskyed/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te/ /de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams de la gtor/ /
136b7(mdo sde): de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur/ /gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mi bzad de/ /dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad smras/ /mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis/ /gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas/ /shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur/ /yab cig de
137a1(mdo sde): skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung / /dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so/ /bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang / /dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi bgyid de/ /'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so/ /rgyal po de
137a2(mdo sde): tshe bu yi tshig thos nas/ /khros te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras/ /nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi/ /dge slong 'di ni myur du sod de phul/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /shin tu gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med/ /'bru mar ngar btags ral
137a3(mdo sde): gri thogs nas su/ /de yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas/ /de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las/ /khrag kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste/ /bcad pa'i 'phro na dpal be'u 'khor lo dag /mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod/ /shin tu ma rungs las ni byas nas su/ /skyed
137a4(mdo sde): mos tshal du de yi mod la byung / /dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni/ /de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to/ /rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par ni/ /de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song / /gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa/ /sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs
137a5(mdo sde): nas phyin/ /lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la/ /cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag des thos te/ /rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro/ /rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas/ /shin tu sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur/ /
137a6(mdo sde): bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan/ /sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang / /dbang po bsrungs shing des pa zhi ba'i yid/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /
137a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing / /zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang / /sems can na ba rtag tu gso byed cing / /
137b1(mdo sde): bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi/ /dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs/ /zhib cing zab la zhi ba blta dka' ba'i/ /chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing / /byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'dren pa
137b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing / /'jig rten ldongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste/ /gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa/ /de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs/ /nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can/ /zhi ba rab zhi rtag tu mnyam gzhag pa/ /'dod pas ldongs
137b3(mdo sde): pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te/ /des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar ltung / /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /mi yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams/ /de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te
137b4(mdo sde): skyabs su mchi/ / //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde
137b5(mdo sde): ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab po/ /chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun tu bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ /khyod la
137b6(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis/ /khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re/ /rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud/ /khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung / /mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon/ /khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi/ /don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ /lha
137b7(mdo sde): rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs/ /grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/ /lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog /kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa/ /nags tshal dam pa dga' ba
138a1(mdo sde): bor nas ni/ /bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa/ /des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi/ /sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig /kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha/ /bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi/ /
138a2(mdo sde): gcig pu seng ge rgyal po ltar/ /dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas/ /sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na/ /'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs pa yis/ /bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad/ /
138a3(mdo sde): 'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang / /khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par/ /bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol pa/ /bde bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os/ /me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la/ /nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol/ /sems
138a4(mdo sde): can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol/ /de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzod/ /nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol/ /chos smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te/ /sdig pa ma legs bdag gis deng bgyis pa/ /'di nas
138a5(mdo sde): 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye/ /bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung / /rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung / /thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam
138a6(mdo sde): dag chos/ /snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa/ /me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs/ /kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug brtul zhugs bzang / /kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan/ /kye ma g.yo med dpal stug spros pa
138a7(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba/ /bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad/ /'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na/ /'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung / /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs
138b1(mdo sde): su gsol/ /kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can/ /kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur/ /kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog /lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol/ /kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig /kye ma sa bcu legs
138b2(mdo sde): gnas tshur spyon cig / kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon 'phags pa/ /tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud/ /kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / /brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis/ /byams pa chen po
138b3(mdo sde): bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig / kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha yi lha/ /chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs/ /mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud/ /bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig /lha khyod lus ni gcad par mi nus te/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos
138b4(mdo sde): kyang / /khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis/ /mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig /lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzes so/ /sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol/ /rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod
138b5(mdo sde): cig / kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur/ /kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur/ /kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur/ /bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni bcad du gsol/ /ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung / /srog chags mnar med chen por lhung
138b6(mdo sde): ba yi/ /skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig /bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol/ /mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol/ /re shig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig /bdag gis bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir/ /
138b7(mdo sde): sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod/ /kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab/ /kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems/ /kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig /kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog /dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med
139a1(mdo sde): gyur/ /kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid/ /sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la/ /dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod/ /kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa/ /kye ma tshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud/ /kun tu bzang po'i
139a2(mdo sde): nags khrod bzhud nas ni/ /dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig /kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che/ /a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'/ /shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa/ /kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol/ /tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i
139a3(mdo sde): gzugs de yang / /kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol/ /kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir/ /me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba/ /dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med/ /kye kye mtshon dang dbyug pas
139a4(mdo sde): btab pa bzod/ /bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can/ /rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang / /mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol/ /kye kye
139a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ /shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog /kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la/ /brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs bcu ldan/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol/ /dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa/ /kye
139a6(mdo sde): kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang / /khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du khod/ /kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che/ /mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug /kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing / /chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'/ /
139a7(mdo sde): kye kye chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang / /rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzad/ /kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog /rab sbyin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig /kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/ /rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/ /
139b1(mdo sde): kye kye dul ba rab dul rjes su bzhud/ /zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nas des/ /kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa/ /chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod/ /kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag /sad par bgyis nas theg pa mchog la khod/ /kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang
139b2(mdo sde): leb la/ /brtson 'grus thag gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te/ /kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /rab tu lhung zhing srid pas ded pa rnams/ /kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog /mnyan pa gdos 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye shin tu sra ba'i grur yang
139b3(mdo sde): ni/ /zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod/ /kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la/ /shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog /kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa/ /kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /btab
139b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can na ba rnams gzigs nas/ /kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la/ /chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal bar mdzod/ /kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog /mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin/ /kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing / /thugs
139b5(mdo sde): rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/ /kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams/ /'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams/ /des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang / /nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs/ /
139b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnga dag shin tu brdung bar mdzod/ /kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tsom gyi/ /'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod/ /kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang / /'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la/ /mi mchog
139b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol/ /me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu tshang ba kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye/ /srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur spyon kye/ /srid pa'i btson rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye/ /ye
140a1(mdo sde): shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye/ /me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye/ /byams dang snying rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye/ /me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ /dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar/ /tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba
140a2(mdo sde): mdzod/ /bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye/ /me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog /mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan/ /gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye/ /ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig /ri rab bzhin
140a3(mdo sde): du mi g.yo brtan pa kye/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye/ /me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye/ /bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod/ /lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye/ /lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye/ /bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig
140a4(mdo sde): thugs rje can/ /grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye/ /'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye/ /me tog zla ba shin tu sbyin dgyes kye/ /bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod/ /khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig /grong 'dir skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang / /khyod
140a5(mdo sde): mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel/ /snying skams 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid/ /thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs/ /gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang / /ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang / /khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms
140a6(mdo sde): dga' ba yangs/ /de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes/ /lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci/ /snyim pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni/ /thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod/ /drang srong chen po'i tshig
140a7(mdo sde): ni deng rtogs te/ /skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin/ /yid kyi nad du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa spang bar bya/ /dge slong bdag gis bsad pa sdig gi las/ /shin tu ma legs mi bde byas pas na/ /bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med
140b1(mdo sde): 'gro/ /bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang tshangs spyod gzhol/ /spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni/ /mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya/ /shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya/ /bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang / /blon po
140b2(mdo sde): dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang / /grong pa dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams/ /de dag thams cad la ni ngas bsgo ba/ /a ga ru dang tsan dan shug pa dang / /shin tu zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas/ /myur du sgrom gyi snying po'i khyogs chos la/ /dge slong 'di ni bsregs pa'i cho ga gyis/ /
140b3(mdo sde): grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te/ /spos rab bzang po yid du 'ong las byas/ /der ni dge slong der yang bcug nas su/ /a ga ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka/ /rgya spos spri ka de bzhin pa ta la/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba
140b4(mdo sde): byug pa dag / shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs/ /de yi rus pa sgrom ni byas par gyur/ /dge slong dag gis de yang der bsregs te/ /rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nas su/ /'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang / /gdugs
140b5(mdo sde): dang ba dan rgyal mtshan thogs nas su/ /rgyal pos der ni sil snyan stong dag dang / /bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud/ /nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du/ /dge slong de yi mchod rten de drung du/ /sdig pa sngan cad cung zad ci byas pa/ /de tshe dus gsum du yang shin
140b6(mdo sde): tu 'chags/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags te/ /phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs/ /rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma med/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te/ /de ni
140b7(mdo sde): de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas/ /mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur/ /'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas/ /sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga/ /de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas/ /lo stong bye ba khrag ni
141a1(mdo sde): dgu bcu lngar/ /de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig drug cu gnyis/ /sngan chad nga yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang / /shin tu mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs/ /mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang / /
141a2(mdo sde): bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing / /sdug bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na/ /yun
141a3(mdo sde): ring shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o/ /rgyal po mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang / /snga ma'i nyes byas rnams las de ma thar/ /mi bzad gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas/ /de shi dmyal ba mi
141a4(mdo sde): bzad mnar med song / /nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad/ /spyod pa spyod tshe mtshon cha dbyug thogs nas/ /'debs byed nan gyis nga yi mig kyang phyung / /byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang / /bu dang chung ma mig dang rang
141a5(mdo sde): gi sha/ /rkang lag dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang / /sngon gyi sdig pa'i las ni zad ma gyur/ /kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod/ /sangs rgyas dpal stug dpag tu med pa mthong / /byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag
141a6(mdo sde): sngon myong gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing / /byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul ba/ /sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas/ /de dag nam yang ngan song sar mi 'gro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos pa/ /chos rje sangs
141a7(mdo sde): rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa/ /tshul khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs/ /gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang bstan par gyis/ /nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpes byin yin/ /nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba/ /me tog zla mdzes pad ma bla ma yin/ /dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal
141b1(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /'jig rten gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur/ /skye dgu dag gi don chen mdzad nas ni/ /mar me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das/ /bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang / /khyim bdag dang ni blon
141b2(mdo sde): po stobs chen dang / /tshong dpon de bzhin grong ba'i mkhar gyi rgyal/ /thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur/ /me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta
141b3(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros
141b4(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
141b5(mdo sde): bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas shing / /bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/ /mngon dga'i
141b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas/ /bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de phyir gnod sems med cing kun 'thun gyis/ /thams cad rtag tu yid du 'ong bar bgyis/ /dpal stug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni/ /byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por
141b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni/ /dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong na/ /mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bstan par bya/ /ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di 'thob 'gyur/ /gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med/ /rin chen sna bdun nor bus
