216b7(mdo sde): tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po dang kun tu 'khor lo dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa
217a1(mdo sde): dag kyang yod/ me tog thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ kha dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong du ma pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang
217a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te/ de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gi lag na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang gling bu dang rgyud can pi bang dang pi bang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang glu dbyangs dang
217a3(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i
217a4(mdo sde): phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar
217a5(mdo sde): po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po dang pa ru Sha ka dang pa ru Sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen
217a6(mdo sde): po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni
217a7(mdo sde): me tog thams cad dang bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs
217b1(mdo sde): pa'i sku mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang mu tig dmar po dang mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas
217b2(mdo sde): g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/
217b3(mdo sde): legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs shin tu legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang shing ta la'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par
217b4(mdo sde): sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i sil snyan yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
217b5(mdo sde): de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ bai dUr+ya dang shel gyis spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ me tog ud
217b6(mdo sde): pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngur pa sgra 'byin pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gang ba dag sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i phreng ba rim pa
217b7(mdo sde): bdun gyis bskor to/ /rin po che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris so/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so/ /
218a1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa
218a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to/ /snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des byang chub
218a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba dang / brkyang ba las skum pa tsam gyis de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar
218a4(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
218a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu lhag ge'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang
218a6(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
218a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis
218b1(mdo sde): tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gzi brjid mtshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs/ /thams cad zil
218b2(mdo sde): gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das/ /shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnabs gyur cing / /dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa
218b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu gsal/ /mi mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yod ma mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od/ /
218b4(mdo sde): snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog mi snang gsal ma mchis/ /rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs/ /ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yod ma mchis/ /mdzad
218b5(mdo sde): pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul/ /spu yi khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang / /'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis/ /'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la/ /sems can rnams la
218b6(mdo sde): gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ /gang na sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro ma mchis shing / /rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la/ /mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i/ /yongs dag zhing de dag kyang
218b7(mdo sde): mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad/ /lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bkang slad du/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro 'gro ba shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas/ /de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la
219a1(mdo sde): skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bur ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis gtam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang / /zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su gtams par ston pa mdzad/ /rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad
219a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so/ /'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa/ /la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig
219a3(mdo sde): stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing / /dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa/ /blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsor gyur cing / /shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas
219a4(mdo sde): mi gcod la/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa/ /bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi/ /gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba dag tu gyur/ /
219a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di na la lar bltam pa lta bur ston mdzad de/ /dog sa la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang / /nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar dbyung ngo zhes/ /yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad/ /mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri
219a6(mdo sde): ma thams cad spang lags kyang / /'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /la lar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'/ /mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad/ /yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag
219a7(mdo sde): sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas/ /brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing / /drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na bzhugs par gda'/ /'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu
219b1(mdo sde): dka' ba spyad nas ni/ /bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'/ /mu stegs can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad slad du/ /sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs par gda'/ /'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye
219b2(mdo sde): shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/ /sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par
219b3(mdo sde): bgyi slad du/ /sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa/ /de bzhin 'gro ba sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston/ /thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston/ /gang
219b4(mdo sde): la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing / /rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/ /bla na med pa 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes/ /phyogs kyi lam rnams thams
219b5(mdo sde): cad du yang 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/ /mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs/ /bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa/ /rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma
219b6(mdo sde): mchis gyur pa dang / /ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos/ /mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gengs/ /ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang 'bral 'gyur gyis/ /'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs
219b7(mdo sde): zhes/ /'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston/ /bde gshegs sku yi phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yod ma mchis/ /gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpag mi lang / /nam mkha'
220a1(mdo sde): lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/ /de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang / /rgyal ba chos kyi
220a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i dngos po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa/ /'di na rgyal ba'i sras
220a3(mdo sde): rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par
220a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa/ /mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /
220a5(mdo sde): byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
220a6(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /nyam nga ba nyung
220a7(mdo sde): ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo/ /'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la bltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo / /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i
220b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
220b2(mdo sde): can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan
220b3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas
220b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la
220b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
220b6(mdo sde): po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyi mthu yin no/ /gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gis mthus 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par
220b7(mdo sde): gda' ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi
221a1(mdo sde): snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/
221a2(mdo sde): 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shar gyi phyogs cha logs su de na ci snang ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos byang
221a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa'
221a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan 'das
221a5(mdo sde): la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o/ /de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du 'og dang /
221a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
221a7(mdo sde): 'das dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
221b1(mdo sde): pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo
221b2(mdo sde): mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ byang chub
221b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du
221b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / mthong
221b5(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying
221b6(mdo sde): pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
221b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par
222a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
222a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad med pa/ de
222a3(mdo sde): snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
222a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
222a5(mdo sde): byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad tsam gyis cung zad cig
222a6(mdo sde): brjod par bya yis nyon cig / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
222a7(mdo sde): 'das mang lags so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad ma mchis te/ ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse
222b1(mdo sde): mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa dang / lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal
222b2(mdo sde): gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas
222b3(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag
222b4(mdo sde): tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/ ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang
222b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de snyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni
222b6(mdo sde): theg pa gsum kho na las brtsams te chos ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas
222b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying
223a1(mdo sde): po de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal
223a2(mdo sde): gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /
223a3(mdo sde): pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod do/ /rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad
223a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ming yang mi grag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs
223a5(mdo sde): par spyod pa las gyur pa/ brdzus te byung ba sha stag go/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na kha zas rags pa med par gyur to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las
223a6(mdo sde): gzhan med de bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang
223a7(mdo sde): dag par rab tu bstan to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad med pa dag don tu gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /
223b1(mdo sde): rtul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med do/ /tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba
223b2(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/ sems can dag la byams pa ni tshad med/ zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongs su grub pa dag ni tshad med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po byang chub sems
223b3(mdo sde): dpa' ni tha na sems bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems can 'di dag
223b4(mdo sde): thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu yongs su bsngo ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa tshad med
223b5(mdo sde): pa'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tshad med pa'o/ /de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ tshad med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o/ /de'i
223b6(mdo sde): phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o/ /gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi
223b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di
224a1(mdo sde): thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba/ /smra ba'i tshogs rnams yang
224a2(mdo sde): dag rab tu 'joms/ /bdud kyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba/ /mtshungs med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla dag dang me yi 'od rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/ /mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la
224a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang / /dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyod par mdzad/ /phrin las de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong ste/ /des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing / /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs
224a4(mdo sde): nas/ /de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste/ /rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/ /srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong / /thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman/ /zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston/ /sems can kun
224a5(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi/ /mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la/ /reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston/ /mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba/ /ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang / /rkyen byung thub pa ma lus
224a6(mdo sde): de dag la/ /de 'dra ba yi snying rje yong ma mchis/ /bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba/ /mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sprin rgya las chos char 'bebs
224a7(mdo sde): pa na/ /gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis/ /de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/ /mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin tu dka'/ /bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs
224b1(mdo sde): sbyangs pa/ /de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs/ /zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang gda'/ /bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yod ma mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'/ /bden pa gzigs
224b2(mdo sde): shing don dam ston pa po/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/ /rgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton/ /nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du brlags/ /rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo
224b3(mdo sde): dang sgyu dang bral/ /rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi mnga'/ /dgongs pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra/ /rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan/ /rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa chen po yon tan 'di
224b4(mdo sde): 'dra'i gter/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan/ /bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang / /yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags/ /yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la/ /bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis
224b5(mdo sde): pa/ /des ni thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/ skyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i blo g.yas g.yon nas/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad ma bkra ba blta na
224b6(mdo sde): sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo / /pad ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u
224b7(mdo sde): gnyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyed gnyis lha 'am klu yin nam/ /gnod sbyin dri za mi ci 'am/ /mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci/ /dris pa smros shig grogs po dag /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de
225a1(mdo sde): ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi/ /ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med na/ /gang gi ming ni 'dri
225a2(mdo sde): bar byed/ /stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing / /klu med srin po yong ma yin/ /mi'am mi ma yin yang rung / /thams cad de na yong med do/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u cig shos des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong
225a3(mdo sde): pa ste/ /ming la ming ni yod ma yin/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med de/ /'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod/ /ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de ni ma mthong ma thos so/ /las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na/ /'di na gang gi ming zhig 'dri/ /tha snyad du ni ming byas nas/ /
225a4(mdo sde): ming btags byas te bstan pa ni/ /kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems/ /cig shos rin chen mchog ces bya/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan
225a5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te
225a6(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ pad ma dag dang dri bda' dang / /me tog phreng dang na bza' dang / /'on te zas dang skom gyis sam/ /rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par
225a7(mdo sde): bgyi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso/ /ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags/ /don 'di legs par bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
225b1(mdo sde): rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing / /gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag /me
225b2(mdo sde): tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste/ /de la tshad ni yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med/ /de 'dra ba yi
225b3(mdo sde): dpal yang med/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'cha'/ /bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra/ /lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig /ji srid
225b4(mdo sde): du ni 'khor ba yi/ /sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa/ /de srid bskal pa du mar yang / /sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi/ /ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa/ /rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi/ /gal te de ring
225b5(mdo sde): slan chad du/ /'dod chags kyi ni sems 'byung na/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur/ /de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no/ /rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra zhing / /gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi/ /gal te de
225b6(mdo sde): ring slan chad du/ /rdul med byang chub ma thob par/ /bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur pa/ /des ni du smra bar 'gyur/ /nams kyang rang sangs rgyas su ni/ /bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de/ /sems can rnams la snying rje zhing / /bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/ /ji ltar
225b7(mdo sde): 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing / /grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las/ /gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi/ /de na nyan thos gang yang med/ /rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med/ /de tshe bye ba tshad med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas/ /bde ba 'di dang
226a1(mdo sde): ldan pa yi/ /skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to/ /gal te 'di dag gzhan min par/ /de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na/ /rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i/ /sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog /
226a2(mdo sde): tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni/ /sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar/ /de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin/ /stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /me tog char dang phye ma'i char/ /spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang / /na bza' bye ba rab tu phab/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi
226a3(mdo sde): snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na
226a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226a5(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin
226a6(mdo sde): no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos pa gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de
226a7(mdo sde): srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das la skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
226b1(mdo sde): ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /skyes bu dam pa
226b2(mdo sde): 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten gyi
226b3(mdo sde): khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
226b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i
226b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bar
226b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe ji tsam pa dang / longs spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par
226b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
227a1(mdo sde): dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid

227a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe dpag tu med du zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/

231a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yang mi snang sku'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /
231a6(mdo sde): sems dang sems kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / na bza' dang na bza'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / gdan dang gdan gyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / gzims pa dang gzims pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / 'chag pa dang 'chag pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / bzhengs pa dang bzhengs pa'i
231a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma yang mi snang / gnas pa dang gnas pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / grib ma'i dbyibs dang grib ma'i dbyibs kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / bzhugs pa dang bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang zhing sgra dang sgra'i mtshan ma yang mi grag go/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang / sangs
231b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang / nyi ma dang / skar ma dang / me dang / nor
231b2(mdo sde): bu dang / glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi snang / dri za rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang / lha'i gzhal med khang gi 'od kyang mi snang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi
231b3(mdo sde): 'od kyang mi snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin tu 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang
231b4(mdo sde): snang bar gyur/ khor yug gi ri dang khor yug gi ri chen po yang snang bar byas/ ri rab dang / de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang / ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te/ phyis ni sems can gang gi mig gi dbang po la yang snang bar ma gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

231b7(mdo sde): las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g.yogs shing brgyan to/ /yul ma ga d+hA thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
232a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
232a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

232a7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs dang /

236a2(mdo sde): ma grol ba'i tshul gyis spyod pa las rnam par grol ba/ 'du ba med pa/ bral ba med pa/ ring po ma yin pa/ thung ngu ma yin pa/ zlum po ma yin pa/ gru bzhi ma yin pa/ kun tu dkyil 'khor ma yin pa/ sbom po ma yin pa/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/ khams kyis
236a3(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/ 'dus byas su rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa/ 'dus ma byas las byung ba ma yin pa/ 'phel ba med pa/ 'bri ba med pa/ sogs pa med pa/ ma skyes pa/ sus kyang ma mthong ba/ ma thos pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/
236a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa ma yin pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa/ 'chi 'pho ma yin pa/ 'jig rten dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa/ lhan cig pa ma yin pa 'ang ma yin pa ste/ lus de ni g.yo ba med pa/ 'khrul pa med pa/ rgod pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ rnam par
236a5(mdo sde): rgyu ba med pa/ bsgom pa med pa/ bsgom pa dang bral ba ma yin pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa/ 'jig pa ma yin pa/ ngo bo nyid ma yin pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang ma yin pa/ sems pa med pa/ ston pa med pa/ sbyor ba med pa/ mi sbyor ba/ mi sbyor ba'ang ma yin pa/ 'dod pa la 'dod
236a6(mdo sde): chags pa ma yin pa/ 'dod pa la 'dod chags med pa ma yin pa/ med pa med pa ma yin pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa ma yin pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/ gnas pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa ma yin pa ste/ sha ra
236a7(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gnas pa de lta bu ni mtshan ma la gnas pa'i sems can lta ba gnyis su lhung ba gang gis kyang shes par nus sam/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma lags te/ skabs ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
236b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral
236b2(mdo sde): ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgyas par bstan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa yang rgya cher yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /lus de lus ma yin zhing lus las
236b3(mdo sde): yongs su grol/ /sus kyang ma byas ma bshig rnyed par gyur pa'ang med/ /chos rnams gang na'ang kun tu ldan med mi ldan med/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku de de ltar gdags/ /'du med 'bral ba med cing gnas med rdzas kyang med/ /ma bzung ma grol mnyam pa med cing ring
236b4(mdo sde): ba med/ /rtsom pa med cing thogs med ci la'ang gnas pa med/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni de 'drar bstan/ /gzung ba med cing ma byas gnas med ci yang med/ /gzugs med sems med gnyis ma yin zhing gcig kyang min/ /dngos med dngos med ma yin ma byung med pa
236b5(mdo sde): ste/ /yang dag nyid du rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'dra'o/ /snying po med cing nyam chung ma yin bcad pa'ang med/ /ma bcad ma byung kun tu ma byung zhig pa'ang med/ /thob pa med cing rdul tsam dag kyang bshig med de/ /rdul med rnams kyi sku de de 'drar shes par bya/ /ma mthong ma thos ma
236b6(mdo sde): bsnams reg par gyur pa med/ /rnam par rig med ma brtags mig yor 'dra ba ste/ /srog chags mthong nas rang gi 'dzin pas sems kyang rangs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas dag gi sku 'grub bstan pa'o/ /phung po ma yin khams min mi mi bden te/ /dag med rnam par dag med
236b7(mdo sde): dbang pos mi reg pa/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog chu zla 'dra/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bar su 'dod pa/ /sku ni rgyu dang rkyen las gyur te rang bzhin med/ /ma skyes ma 'gags song ba med cing 'phos pa'ang med/ /brtags na 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma bzhin du snang / /
237a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni mi rtog de 'drar ltos/ /zhi med rab zhi ma yin zhi bral sbyor ba'ang med/ /chags med rigs med 'di na chad pa stong pa bzhin/ /yang na ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /de ltar mthong na nyin mtshan sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /zhing rnams
237a2(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag ji tsam phyogs rnams su/ /srid pa'i rtse mo bar du rin chen gang ba dag /sangs rgyas rnams la bskal mang phye ma'i mthar 'bul ba/ /sbyin pa de ni mdo sde 'di bris char mi phod/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ba'i bskal par yang / /'gro la snyoms pa'i sems
237a3(mdo sde): kyis byams pa bsgoms pa bas/ /gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya ting 'dzin mchog mos pa/ /tshul khrims de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phod/ /ji tsam sngon gyi 'khor ba dag ni mtha' yas pa/ /de srid bskal par srog chags kun la rtag bzod pa/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'di la dad pa
237a4(mdo sde): gcig bskyed na/ /'dir dad bsod nams dang ni ri rab yungs 'bru bzhin/ /ji tsam 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can rnam mang skyes/ /de dag mi gang bskal pa mang por mgor thogs shing / /lus kyang mi ngal nam du'ang g.yo ba mi skyed pa/ /brtson 'grus de ni bzod pa 'di yi
237a5(mdo sde): char mi phod/ /zhing brgya'i bye ma ji snyed de bas lhag pa yi/ /bskal pa mang por gang rnams bsam gtan byed pa bas/ /mdo sde 'di la nyin zhag gcig tsam sbyor ba yang / /bsod nams de ni bzod pa 'di yi dper mi rung / /rdul khams ji snyed pa yi bskal pa grangs med par/ /
237a6(mdo sde): shes rab mtha' gnyis spangs la mngon par brtson pa bas/ /gang gis ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes 'di rtogs pa/ /bsod nams de yang rgya mtsho dang ni chu thigs bzhin/ /rgyal ba la ni gzugs dang mtshan mar ma lta shig /byis pa lta bus bde bar gshegs la sems ma ltar/ /
237a7(mdo sde): gang gis rab 'byor lta bur nga ni mthong gyur pa/ /des ni stong gsum kun gyi sbyin pa thams cad sbyangs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ yang gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
237b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod na lhag pa'i
237b2(mdo sde): bsam pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba ni nyin zhag gcig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom
237b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod pa des ting nge 'dzin 'di la nyin mtshan du sbyar bar bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi tshul sgrub par 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi gnas so/ /'di las gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ngo / /ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
237b5(mdo sde): kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyor ba ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /bdud kyi las thams
237b6(mdo sde): cad las kyang yang dag par 'da'o/ /'gro ba dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa ma yin/ spyod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyor ba ni gang ci smra ba de dag thams cad 'khrul pa med do/ /de'i lus kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams
237b7(mdo sde): cad kyang skyon med do/ /ngag gi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun tu 'byung ba med do/ /yid kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po ngag khong du chud
238a1(mdo sde): par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos bstan par khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba ston par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bden pa'i tshul khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin
238a2(mdo sde): 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la
238a3(mdo sde): sbyar bar bya'o/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'od phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'khor phun sum tshogs
238a4(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bstan pa phun
238a5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /yongs su tshol ba dang / mos pa
238a6(mdo sde): dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad de la dka' bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
238a7(mdo sde): po che chen po 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i shing gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
238b1(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ye shes mtha' yas phyag rgya mdo sde 'di/ /ye shes phung po ye shes khyad 'phags mchog /ye shes 'od dang ye shes 'byor
238b2(mdo sde): pa'i mdzod/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes sgor 'jug pa/ /shes dbang shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab sa/ /shes rab sgron ma shes rab 'od mun sel/ /shes rab mi zad shes rab tshul rab bshad/ /nyi ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum na lhan/ /mnyam pa 'byor pa mnyam pa nyid la
238b3(mdo sde): gnas/ /'dzin pa thams cad gcod dang bden pa'i tshul/ /ting 'dzin kun sgo ye shes phyag rgya ni/ /sangs rgyas so so yang dag rig pa'i rig /zad mi shes pa'i nor mdzod pha rol 'gro/ /shes rab rdzu 'phrul shes rab 'byung gnas gter/ /bsam pa ji bzhin dga' bde'i rtsa ba ste/ /ting
238b4(mdo sde): 'dzin phyag rgya 'di ni bde gshegs nor/ /rin chen ldan pa'i yul 'khor rgyal pos bsten/ /rin chen dam pa rin chen mchog 'byung gnas/ /'dod chags rdul dang zhe sdang dri ma sel/ /mdo bshad 'di ni rin chen rtsa ba'o/ /zhi zhing zhi la yid ni zhi byed pa/ /mdzes pa byed dang bdag tu
238b5(mdo sde): lta ba sbyong / /sangs rgyas gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di rnyed pas/ /dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis bdud ni rab tu 'joms/ /shes bya'i srog chags ye shes shes byed pa/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes 'byor shes rab/ /ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' yas te/ /mdo sde 'di ni ye shes
238b6(mdo sde): sgo 'byung gnas/ /dul ba 'dul ba mdud pa gnyis gcod de/ /lta byas drug cu gnyis kyi lta ba sbyong / /rgyal ba'i sgo ste bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'byung gnas/ /byang chub shin tu byang chub rang bzhin 'thun/ /mu stegs shes byed byang chub rgyu
238b7(mdo sde): shes byed/ /byang chub 'di ni gnyid log sad byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'dir mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /chos kyi tshul dang rigs pa rnam par sgom/ /mtha' yas pa yi gzungs rnams rab tu sgrub/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi chos la 'jug pa ste/ /gzungs 'di nyid ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /
239a1(mdo sde): 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa sgrub/ /'di ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin dang bzod/ /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab mi zad de/ /'dir gnas pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs/ /las dang nyon mongs pa la 'jigs ma byed/ /blo gros ngan pa'i bdud kyis ma 'jigs
239a2(mdo sde): shig / 'di la sbyor la rab tu mchod med de/ /ji ltar bsam bzhin byang chub de 'tshang rgya/ /mdo sde 'di ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu gang lhags byang chub mi phyed snod/ /sras rnams dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di la/ /'dug pa de dag dbang du gyur pa yin/ /'di ni 'das
239a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /mdo sde 'di ni ma byon rnams kyi yum/ /da ltar byung ba thams cad 'di las byung / /de phyir rgyal ba'i spun rnams 'dir sbyor cig /gang dag mdo 'di tshul la rab gnas pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor 'thob cing / /las kyang rnam dag
239a4(mdo sde): spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /mi ldog sa 'thob 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gang gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag
239a5(mdo sde): drug cu rtsa brgyad ni bskal pa brgya stong nas bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis skad cig mi zad pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /lha dang mi'i skye
239a6(mdo sde): dgu dkrigs pa phrag drug cu po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ thams cad ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo / /de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la
239a7(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu na 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
239b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de dag las kha cig yun ring po nas smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa dag ni bzod pa thob bo/ /kha cig smon lam myur du 'debs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239b2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal
239b3(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing spros pa med pa la dga' bas mi gnas par spyad par bya'o/ /chos thams cad la mi gnas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
239b4(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /spros pa med pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /gnas med par spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / phrag dog med
239b5(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
239b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung zhing rab tu bsrung bar spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de ni gang gi yang ma lags/ gang nas kyang ma lags/ gang na yang ma
239b7(mdo sde): lags/ gang gis kyang ma lags/ ci yang ma lags te/ mi snang ba/ gzung du ma mchis pa thob pa ma lags pa/ chud zos pa ma lags pa'o/ /de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan
240a1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung ba dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa dang /
240a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par spro'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de la mngon par gsol te/ smon lam yang btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
240a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i bsam pas soms shig /'di khyod kyi las yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag
240a4(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas bsams lags so/ /
240a5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag gi nang na brgyad stong ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
240a6(mdo sde): 'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i tshe/ nga yi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
240a7(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di spong bar 'gyur/ 'gal bar byed par 'gyur/ mi ston par 'gyur/ mi 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rab tu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu
240b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
240b2(mdo sde): dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can gyi khams mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang
240b3(mdo sde): po yid du 'ong ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi
240b4(mdo sde): yon tan bsngags pa yongs su rdzogs pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa rnam pa bdun po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byams pa de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
240b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / gang dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / gang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems
240b6(mdo sde): can gyi khams mthong nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa sems bskyed pa 'di gsum ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bsrung ba yin te/ myur du bla na med pa
240b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa sems bskyed pa de dag las lhag ma bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur ba'o/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog
241a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la phrag dog med pa yin/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa mi smra
241a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi chags pa yin/ chos zab mo la mos pa yin te/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba sna tshogs la mos pa ma yin gyi chos thams cad la chos zab mo dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos
241a3(mdo sde): lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid chung zhing bka' blo mi bde ba yin/ dman pa la mos shing thams cad
241a4(mdo sde): la dman pa'i chos ston pa yin/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags shing slong ba ster ba'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yin/ sgyu dang ldan zhing g.yo byed pa yin/ stong pa nyid la ngag gi /las lhur len pas mi drang ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos
241a5(mdo sde): lnga po de dag dang ldan na de dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag mi dmigs shing bdag la mi stod pa dang / sems can mi dmigs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
241a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pas mi ston pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi lta ba ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su
241a7(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /phrag dog can dang shes kyi khe 'dod dang / /gnod pa byed dang 'chos dang zur za dang / /smra ba tsam dang dman pa'i tshul can gyis/ /bde gshegs byang chub 'di ni bsrung mi nus/ /
241b1(mdo sde): bas mthar dga' zhing dgon dben spyod yul ba/ /tshig tsam ma yin zab mo bzod pa dang / /bse lta bu dang shes khe bde bsrings pa/ /de ni byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba srung / /tshogs las bsrings shing rab tu zhi la mos/ /lta bur 'jigs shing gnas med rgyu/ /nam mkha' rlung bzhin
241b2(mdo sde): rnyed la mi chags pa/ /de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/ /lus la mi lta srog don mi gnyer na/ /shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/ /brtson brtsams bdag gi ma yin ci yang min/ /de ni ma 'ongs dus na byang chub snod/ /phyi ma'i dus na sems can 'byung ba ni/ /bdag cag byang chub
241b3(mdo sde): la ni spyod ces 'dzer/ /de dag sems rgod tshul 'chos nyon mongs bcas/ /de dag rnams kyis chos 'di bsrung mi nus/ /'dren pa mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi/ /bskal pa dag ni stong phrag bye ba na/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i tog ces bya ba byung / /'gro ba rnams la ting 'dzin 'di bshad dran/ /rgyal
241b4(mdo sde): ba de yi 'dus pa dang po ni/ /phyir mi ldog pa khrag khrig brgyad cu ste/ /'dus pa gnyis pa khrag khrig bdun cu yin/ /'dus pa gsum pa bdun cu rtsa gsum mo/ /rgyal ba'i tshe ni bskal pa bye ba mang / /'od kyang dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gsum pa/ /dge 'dun bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste/ /
241b5(mdo sde): thams cad dgra bcom dbang ldan gyur pa'o/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po byung ba ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba bsod nams 'phags zhes bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad du gyur pa ni/ /mtshungs par dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi tshad kyang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po'i slas ni bye ba drug cu
241b6(mdo sde): tham/ /bu ni stong tham pa ste nyung ma yin/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba'i 'od ces bya/ /grong khyer dag ni bye ba brgyad cur gyur/ /thams cad skyed mos tshal rgyas mdzes par gnas/ /thams cad lo legs bde zhing dga' ba ste/ /sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang gnas 'dra/ /rgyal pos rmi
241b7(mdo sde): lam du ni zla ba'i tog / sangs rgyas byung ngo zhes ni thos gyur nas/ /g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang / /rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer song nas/ /des ni ting 'dzin zab mo rgyal ba'i sku/ /mdo sde bshad pa 'di ni thos nas su/ /ston pa ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad gsol zhes/ /rgyal
242a1(mdo sde): srid thams cad sangs rgyas de la phul/ /grong khyer kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang ni tsan dan rgyus bsgrubs byas/ /des ni thams cad rtse rgod bcas par phul/ /'chag pa'i sa ni gser gyi gyim bag g.yogs/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad cur tshang bar yang / /
242a2(mdo sde): rgyal po las gzhan mi byed mchod pa byed/ /rgyal po nam du'ang rmugs dang gnyid mi bskyed/ /'dod la mi 'dun rgyal srid srid ma yin/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma re re zhing / /bkod pa gang dag phul bar gyur pa ni/ /thams cad tshig gis bshad par mi
242a3(mdo sde): nus so/ /lkog tu song nas rtog pa skyed gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni mchog tu zab pa ste/ /zang zing 'dzin pas ye shes phyag rgya yi/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bsgrub par mi nus snyam/ /de ni rab byung rgyal srid thams cad spangs/ /sha na ka yi ras gyon bsod snyoms spyod/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad
242a4(mdo sde): cu tshang bar yang / /gnyid kyis ma non ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /skabs der sangs rgyas kyis ni ji tsam gang / /rab tu bshad pa'i chos rnams des bzung nas/ /bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og des/ /mchod rten bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi byas/ /rin chen bdun gyis spras shing
242a5(mdo sde): mdzes byas pa'i/ /gdugs ni lnga brgya kun la rab tu phul/ /kun la sil snyan khrol ba brgya rnams dang / /mar me stong phrag brgya yang rab tu phul/ /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul la gnas nas su/ /lo ni bye ba stong phrag bdun cu gsum/ /zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnas nas ni/ /
242a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di 'khor la rab tu bshad/ /legs shes bya ba'ang 'dod pa ma yin na/ /shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/ /de'i tshe chos bsrung ba yi bsam pa yis/ /mgron du bos pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba brgyad cu dang / /khrag khrig bdun cu des
242a7(mdo sde): ni mnyes par byas/ /de dag kun la de 'dra'i bkod pa byas/ /thams cad las kyang ting 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /gang dag byang chub 'di ni bsrung 'dod pa/ /de dag 'dod pa med cing mos pa dang / /g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pas sgom pa yis/ /rgyal po de 'dra bar ni bslab par gyis/ /
242b1(mdo sde): chos 'dod ma yin rnyed pa don gnyer la/ /bsdams pa min dag byang chub slob bo zhes/ /smra 'gyur kha cig phyi ma'i dus 'byung ste/ /smra la dga' zhing thams cad stong zhes smra/ /stong nyid ji bzhin stong pa mi shes te/ /'tsho chags tha bar bcas shing nyon mongs bcas/ /tshig gis 'di dag
242b2(mdo sde): stong nyid 'dzin 'jug cing / /bdag ni byang chub the tsom med ces smra/ /de tshe rgyal mchog tshe ni dpag med gyur/ /bu stong dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di pa/ /mdun na 'dug pa'i 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad de tshe rab tu byung / /rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig rnams dran te/ /de las
242b3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste de dag gis/ /gang ci bshad pa ngas kun sgra tsam bshad/ /ngas ni gnas pas stong pa nyid kyang bsgoms/ /de lta'i thabs kyis bskal pa mtha' yas par/ /ngas ni gnas pas sangs rgyas gang dag mchod/ /nga ni de yi byang chub ma thob kyi/ /gzhan du 'di la gnas te
242b4(mdo sde): bsgrubs pas na/ /mar me mdzad pa mthong ma thag tu ni/ /som nyi spangs nas mnyam pa nyid mthong bas/ /de nas khyod ni shAkya seng ge yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes 'dren pas bdag lung bstan/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
242b5(mdo sde): ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa ma skyes dgra'i ma dpal zhes bya ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa bye ba ldan gyi bu mo gser mchog snang ba zhes bya ba yang 'khor de nyid
242b6(mdo sde): du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal dang / gser mchog snang gnyis stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/
242b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par so so nas ras bcos ma brgya stong ri ba phrugs res bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol to/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi skon bu lnga brgyas kyang / bcom ldan
243a1(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'di la mos par bgyi/ yid ches par bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun
243a2(mdo sde): chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag la yang bdag cag gis gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bgyi bar
243a3(mdo sde): spro'o/ /sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /stong pa nyid spang bar mi bgyi'o/ /tshig lhur blang bar mi bgyi'i nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lus dang srog la yang blta bar mi bgyi na/ slad rol gyi
243a4(mdo sde): dngos po rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ btsun mo dam pa de gnyis 'di lta bur rjes su slob pa na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo'i 'khor bud med brgya stong stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de
243a5(mdo sde): dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo / /rjes su yi rangs nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro'o/ /yul ma ga d+hA'i dge bsnyen ma yul ma ga d+hA na 'khod pa drug
243a6(mdo sde): khri las gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo / /rjes su yi rangs nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos gzung bar spro'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas de'i tshe
243a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
243b1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ngo / /de dag zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du
243b2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad zhi bar byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan
243b3(mdo sde): brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas dpal dang / bye ba ldan pa'i bu mo gser mchog snang ba gnyis stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
243b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ mi mchog yon tan mnga' ba srid pa gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /nam mkha' zla ba 'dra ba yon tan brgya rnams
243b5(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas/ /rab tu bzhad pa legs par mdzes pa mchog tu snyan pa'i gsung / /stobs bcu ji slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni bka' stsal gsol/ /sems can dam pa zla ba 'dra ba'i zhal ni rab 'dzum 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ /shin tu mdzes shing mchog tu dri med tshangs pa'i dbyangs
243b6(mdo sde): dang 'jam pa'i sgra dang dbyangs/ /sems la snum zhing lus la sim pa bde bas sems ni rab tu tshim mdzad pa/ /mi yi dam pa seng ge'i 'dzum mdzad de yi rgyu ni 'dren pa lung bstan gsol/ /'khrugs pa mi mnga' ba dang ma rnyogs ma tshang mi mnga' gsung / /shin tu ldan zhing rab tu mnyam
243b7(mdo sde): la mchog tu mdzes par snyan/ /pha rol spyod pa'i tshul ni khrag khrig brgya dag rnam par 'byed/ /ci yi slad du yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bka' stsal gsol/ /gsung ni brgyad dang ldan zhing yan lag drug cu rnams dang ldan/ /skad ni bdun brgya dag dang yi ge bye ba drug cu ldan/ /
244a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsung gi rigs pa bye ba khrag khrig bcu dang brgyad cu ste/ /'dzum mdzad don gyi gling bzhi dpag tu ma mchis bka' stsal gsol/ /ri bo mchog dang mtshungs 'dra pha rol tshogs kyis mi g.yos pa/ /tshul brgya rnam par 'byed cing yid gnyis rnam par 'thor mdzad
244a2(mdo sde): pa/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad pa 'gro la bde sbyin pa/ /'di ltar sdug pa 'dzum mdzad spyod pa ji bzhin dbye bar gsol/ /gser gyi ri ltar dga' zhing rin chen mchod sdong 'dra ba'i sku/ /zhal ras pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas 'dra blta ba'i ngos/ /dbang po'i sgra sgrog seng
244a3(mdo sde): ge'i rnam gnon stobs ldan pa/ /rab tu bzhad pa bzhad pa'i don gyi rigs pa lung bstan gsol/ /srid pa gsum na mtshungs pa ma mchis dri gsum dri mi mnga'/ /mdzes par spyod pas srid pa brgya dag nye bar zhi mdzad dgyes/ /khyod kyi 'dzum pa mdzad pa phyogs bcu dag tu rgya cher gsal/ /
244a4(mdo sde): bdud rtsi mun pa sel ba rnam par dbye ba myur du gsungs/ /pi bang rdza rnga rgyud gcig rgyud gsum dung dang gling bu dang / /mi 'am ci dang ka la ping ka dag dang khu byug dang / /ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang rnga dang rdza rnga pheg rdob rnams/ /dus gcig sbyar ba bgyis kyang sangs rgyas gsung gi brgya char mi 'gyur
244a5(mdo sde): ro/ /phyogs bcu dag nas lhags par gyur pa'i 'khor yangs 'di dag ni/ /mang 'dzin blo gros mang zhing blo gros ngan par lhung ba ste/ /ci nas 'bras bcas brtul zhugs grub nas phyogs phyogs mchi 'gyur bar/ /ji ltar 'di dag sred pa'i 'khri shing btsal ba de 'dra gsungs/ /bye ba'i
244a6(mdo sde): zhing gnas lhags pa 'khor gyi dam pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyogs bcu'i mi mchog dag gis chos 'dod pa dag rab bkye ba/ /de dag ci nas dngos grub thob nas rga ste 'chi 'gyur bar/ /de dag la ni 'dzum pa'i gleng gzhi chos char dbab tu gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i
244a7(mdo sde): btsun mo dpal dang / gser mchog snang la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ dran pa bskal pa dpag tu med pa gang gA'i bye snyed na/ /gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya 'jig rten 'dren pa byung / /ston pa de yi tshe lo bye ba phrag ni bdun cu ste/ /chos kyi rgyal po de yi
244b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dge 'dun mtha' yas gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po shes rab kha lo sgyur ba byung / /de yi chung ma tog gi rgyal po dang yang gnyis pa ni/ /'od 'phro zhes bya dngos po kun la ma chags mngon par byung / /chos 'dod rab tu byung nas lo ni bye bar chos tshul bsrungs/ /des ni
244b2(mdo sde): 'dren pa bye ba drug cu dag dang gzhan yang ni/ /dkrigs phrag sum cu'i chos tshul 'thun par mtha' dus der bsrungs te/ /ma 'ongs 'jig rten mgon po gang gA sum cu'i bye snyed kyi/ /chos tshul nyams par 'gyur tshe 'thun par der ni srung bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs de dang der ni khyed 'thun sems
244b3(mdo sde): can dag gyur pa/ /rgyal po 'khrugs med shes rab kha lo sgyur ba'i chung mar 'gyur/ /chos bsrungs pas na phyi ma'i dus na bud med dngos spangs te/ /bde ba can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od mthong 'gyur/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba gzhan yang ji snyed de dag 'thun par ni/ /zad 'gyur
